TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{ePark, author = {Indigenous Languages Research and Development Foundation}, title = {族語E樂園}, year = {2020}, url = {https://web.klokah.tw/} }

S.FORM: tiku Matu'uwal na' Itaal ga, kumal naha' nanak maha' ita' ga Matu'uwal, ani pinatiqan ini ga pinsibaq na' nanabakis,
tiko Mato'owal na' Itaal ga, komal naha' nanak maha' ita' ga Mato'owal, ani pinatiqan ini ga pinsibaq na' nanabakis,
S.TRANSL: 汶水泰雅人（族人自稱Matu’uwal），不管是文獻記載或耆老口述

S.FORM: kumal ku' Itaal i' Tayan maha', minukahul i' Papakwaqa ku' Itaal.
komal ko' Itaal i' Tayan maha', minokahol i' Papakwaqa ko' Itaal.
S.TRANSL: 泰安鄉大多數的泰雅族人認為，大霸尖山是泰雅族的起源地，

S.FORM: ini packa' cku' kinal nku' qalaqalang maha', Itaal ga, minukahul i' Nantosyen i' Renngay Go i' Pinsbakan maha' kumal ku' Itaal.
ini packa' cko' kinal nko' qalaqalang maha', Itaal ga, minokahol i' Nantosyen i' Renngay Go i' Pinsbakan maha' komal ko' Itaal.
S.TRANSL: 與泰雅族各部落認為，泰雅族的起源地在南投縣仁愛鄉賓斯博干（pinsbkan）的口述有很大的出入，

S.FORM: asikina ga kuruma' ka Itaal ka Matu'uwal ga, sinnawawun naha' maha', tiku Matu'uwal ga, asi glug nku' luliyung na' Holongsi ru tayhuk i' cku' raya' niya' ka luliyung na' Mayri' la.
asikina ga koroma' ka Itaal ka Mato'owal ga, sinnawawon naha' maha', tiko Mato'owal ga, asi glog nko' loliyong na' Holongsi ro tayhok i' cko' raya' niya' ka loliyong na' Mayri' la.
S.TRANSL: 但多數的汶水人更相信，汶水人是沿著後龍溪一路來到其上游汶水溪，

S.FORM: babaw niya'la ga, tumimu' i' Cingancun i' Mabawtu'an, Paquwali' i' Mabawkian ru Cinsuwei i' Tabilas.
babaw niya'la ga, tomimo' i' Cingancon i' Mabawto'an, Paqowali' i' Mabawkian ro Cinsowei i' Tabilas.
S.TRANSL: 在清安村大坪部落（Mabawtu’an），八卦村八卦部落（Mabawkian），錦水村的圓墩部落蓋房子。

S.FORM: Mayrinax ga siniralu' nku' kumal cu' kai' na' squliq. Matu'uwal ga siniralu' nku' Itaal i' Tabilas.
Mayrinax ga siniralo' nko' komal co' kai' na' sqoliq. Mato'owal ga siniralo' nko' Itaal i' Tabilas.
S.TRANSL: Mayrinax 是別族（賽考利克）對汶水泰雅人的稱呼，Matu’uwal 是汶水泰雅人的自稱，

S.FORM: ani ini packa' ku' sinralu'an ga macka' i' Itaal i' Tabilas kahabag.
ani ini packa' ko' sinralo'an ga macka' i' Itaal i' Tabilas kahabag.
S.TRANSL: 儘管稱呼不同，但都是指稱說汶水泰雅語的泰雅族人，

S.FORM: ralu' nku' inuwahan na' Mayrinax ru Matu'uwal. tiku nanabakis nku' Tabilas ga ini naha' baqibaqi cuqaang la.
ralo' nko' inowahan na' Mayrinax ro Mato'owal. tiko nanabakis nko' Tabilas ga ini naha' baqibaqi coqaang la.
S.TRANSL: mayrinax 與 matu’uwal 名稱真正的由來，老一輩的汶水泰雅族人早已不清楚，

S.FORM: kumal Abisang maha', maki runi ku' Gipun ga siniralu' naha' ku' luliyung ga Mayri' san niya'.
komal Abisang maha', maki roni ko' Gipon ga siniralo' naha' ko' loliyong ga Mayri' san niya'.
S.TRANSL: 但根據發音人湯元基先生的說法mayri’是汶水泰雅人早期對汶水溪的稱呼，

S.FORM: babaw niya' ga rasun nku' Gipun ku' minakiya i' Babuan cu' Para ka kinahakul ru siralu'an naha' ku' miniyani i' runi maha' Mayrinax. kumal cu' kai' na' Matu'uwal ga yani ku' Cinswei i' Tabilas, Paquwali' i' Mabawkian ru Cingan i' Mabawtuan

babaw niya' ga rason nko' Gipon ko' minakiya i' Baboan co' Para ka kinahakol ro siralo'an naha' ko' miniyani i' roni maha' Mayrinax. komal co' kai' na' Mato'owal ga yani ko' Cinswei i' Tabilas, Paqowali' i' Mabawkian ro Cingan i' Mabawtoan
S.TRANSL: 後來日本人迫使原本住在Babuan cu’ Para移居到錦水村周邊部落的Kinahakul 用來稱呼住在汶水溪旁的圓墩部落的汶水人為Mayrinax，

S.FORM: siqunun ga kii' mamatu' kabhul cu' rawiq maha' kumal ku' Tayan Go.
siqonon ga kii' mamato' kabhol co' rawiq maha' komal ko' Tayan Go.
S.TRANSL: 目前說汶水泰雅語的Matu’uwal 人

S.FORM: kumal ku' Sebu' na' Taywan maha' i' kabhul ru qutux cu' kaal. rawiq na' Itaal kahabag ga mamaspat cu' mang ru mamaspat cu' seng.
komal ko' Sebo' na' Taywan maha' i' kabhol ro qotox co' kaal. rawiq na' Itaal kahabag ga mamaspat co' mang ro mamaspat co' seng.
S.TRANSL: 根據台灣政府101年的說法，全泰雅族人口約8萬8千人，

S.FORM: payux tikay hayhay ku' rawiq na' kakanayril cku' mamaliku. nanabakis na' Itaal ga ini kapayux.
payox tikay hayhay ko' rawiq na' kakanayril cko' mamaliko. nanabakis na' Itaal ga ini kapayox.
S.TRANSL: 女性人口比男性人口多，老年人口不多，

S.FORM: ulu'laqi' na' kinabahan na' Matu'uwal ga aruwa' 'i' masiglug ki' siputu', hulu' ru tuiya'. yani ku' araruwa' tikay ku' rawiq na' Matu'uwal i' sawni.
olo'laqi' na' kinabahan na' Mato'owal ga arowa' 'i' masiglog ki' sipoto', holo' ro toiya'. yani ko' ararowa' tikay ko' rawiq na' Mato'owal i' sawni.
S.TRANSL: 年輕人與外族通婚導致人口減少，因此泰雅族的人口至今成長不多。

S.FORM: wawaw na' rawiq na' Matu'uwal ga, macka' ki' kinal na' Sebu' na' Taywan ku' wawaw na' rawiq ka hani.
wawaw na' rawiq na' Mato'owal ga, macka' ki' kinal na' Sebo' na' Taywan ko' wawaw na' rawiq ka hani.
S.TRANSL: 汶水泰雅的人口很接近台灣政府的說法。

S.FORM: tiku kumal cu' kai' na' Matu'uwal ga yani ku' kiya' cku' Tabilas i' Cinswei, kii' kiya' humaynas cu' tugal cu' kabhul masiqaang ku' Matu'uwal.
tiko komal co' kai' na' Mato'owal ga yani ko' kiya' cko' Tabilas i' Cinswei, kii' kiya' homaynas co' togal co' kabhol masiqaang ko' Mato'owal.
S.TRANSL: 汶水泰雅人住在錦水村的圓墩部落人口大約300人，

S.FORM: Mabawkian i' Paquwli' ga, qutux cu' kabhul ru mapitu kimnamalapgan ru masiqaang ku' Matu'uwal.
Mabawkian i' Paqowli' ga, qotox co' kabhol ro mapito kimnamalapgan ro masiqaang ko' Mato'owal.
S.TRANSL: 八卦村的八卦部落人口約170人，

S.FORM: tiku kiya' cku' Mabawtuan i' Cingan ga, kii' qutux cu' kabhul ru maymal kimnamalapgan ru masiqaang ku' Matu'uwal.
tiko kiya' cko' Mabawtoan i' Cingan ga, kii' qotox co' kabhol ro maymal kimnamalapgan ro masiqaang ko' Mato'owal.
S.TRANSL: 清安村大坪部落人口則有150人左右，

S.FORM: siqunun kahabag ku' tugal ka tinqalangan na' Matu'uwal ga, kii' mamatu' cu' kabhul cu' rawiq.
siqonon kahabag ko' togal ka tinqalangan na' Mato'owal ga, kii' mamato' co' kabhol co' rawiq.
S.TRANSL: 三個部落合起來共計超過600人。

S.FORM: tinqalangan na' Tabilas i' Cinswei ga ka qutux cu' imuwaag ga, matkaqutux cu' imuwaag ga Huwang, Lin, Lyu, Bu ru Ye, Tien, Tang, Cong ru Li.
tinqalangan na' Tabilas i' Cinswei ga ka qotox co' imowaag ga, matkaqotox co' imowaag ga Howang, Lin, Lyo, Bo ro Ye, Tien, Tang, Cong ro Li.
S.TRANSL: 在錦水村的圓墩部落部的家族結構以黃姓、林姓、劉姓、葉姓、傅姓、田姓，湯姓、鍾姓、李姓等，

S.FORM: tinqalangan na' Mabawkian i' Paquwli' ka qutux cu' imuwaag ga, matkaqutux cu' imuwaag ga Lin, Tien, Co, Huwang ru Li.
tinqalangan na' Mabawkian i' Paqowli' ka qotox co' imowaag ga, matkaqotox co' imowaag ga Lin, Tien, Co, Howang ro Li.
S.TRANSL: 八卦村的八卦部落，以林姓、田姓、周姓、黃姓，李姓等，

S.FORM: tinqalangan na' Mabawtuan i' Cingan ka qutux cu' imuwaag ga, matkaqutux cu' imuwaag ga Lyu, Long, Bong, Lin.
tinqalangan na' Mabawtoan i' Cingan ka qotox co' imowaag ga, matkaqotox co' imowaag ga Lyo, Long, Bong, Lin.
S.TRANSL: 其次是清安村的大坪部落，以劉姓、龍姓、馮姓、林姓等成為一個宗族，

S.FORM: muwani ku' pinatasan na' Tayan Go i' 2008 cu' kaal.
mowani ko' pinatasan na' Tayan Go i' 2008 co' kaal.
S.TRANSL: 人口大約六百人左右，《泰安鄉志》2008如此說。

S.FORM: san maha' kai' nku' Matu'uwal ga masasawbih cku' kai' na' c'uli'. kumal ku'mamaliku ini ga kakanayril ga ini packa' ku' kakalan naha'.
san maha' kai' nko' Mato'owal ga masasawbih cko' kai' na' c'oli'. komal ko'mamaliko ini ga kakanayril ga ini packa' ko' kakalan naha'.
S.TRANSL: 汶水泰雅語屬於泰雅語的澤傲利方言群，會因為說話者為男性或女性而使用不同的語言型態，

S.FORM: kahuy san na' kakanayril, kahuniq san na' mamaliku.
kahoy san na' kakanayril, kahoniq san na' mamaliko.
S.TRANSL: 例如：「樹木」女性會說（kahuy），男性會說（kahuniq），

S.FORM: imu san na' kakanayril ga, imuwaag san na' mamaliku.
imo san na' kakanayril ga, imowaag san na' mamaliko.
S.TRANSL: 例如：「房子」女性會說（imu），男性會說（imuwaag）……。

S.FORM: tiku mapitu' kinamlapgan ka nanabakis nku' Matu'uwal ga ini qabaq cuqaang 'i' kumal cu' kai' na' mamaliku ini ga kai' na' kakanayril.
tiko mapito' kinamlapgan ka nanabakis nko' Mato'owal ga ini qabaq coqaang 'i' komal co' kai' na' mamaliko ini ga kai' na' kakanayril.
S.TRANSL: 現在七十歲左右的汶水耆老不會因為男女性別差異而使用不同的語言型態，

S.FORM: kinabahan na' ulu'laqi' i' sawni ga, ini qabaq cubalay 'i' kumal la ku' kai' nku' Matu'uwal. kai' nku' Matu'uwal ga,
kinabahan na' olo'laqi' i' sawni ga, ini qabaq cobalay 'i' komal la ko' kai' nko' Mato'owal. kai' nko' Mato'owal ga,
S.TRANSL: 而年輕人已不會使用自己的語言了，

S.FORM: kiya' na ku' sinubilan cu' hanang ru kai' na' nanabakis cucunga' kiya' wiy ku' mananananaq ru kinabalaiq ka kai' nku' Matu'uwal i' sawni.
kiya' na ko' sinobilan co' hanang ro kai' na' nanabakis coconga' kiya' wiy ko' mananananaq ro kinabalaiq ka kai' nko' Mato'owal i' sawni.
S.TRANSL: 汶水泰雅語保存較古老的音韻與構詞現象，又因為汶水泰雅語語言地位之特殊性及重要性，

S.FORM: tiku magalpug cu' kaal ka aruwa' ka sawni ga, payux ku' papasibaq 'i' muwah 'i' makibaq cku' kai' nku' Matu'uwal.
tiko magalpog co' kaal ka arowa' ka sawni ga, payox ko' papasibaq 'i' mowah 'i' makibaq cko' kai' nko' Mato'owal.
S.TRANSL: 數十年來學界將本語言作為研究的對象與題材。

S.FORM: talan na' nanabakis ku' ulu'laqi' na' kinabahan ka ini qabaq 'i' kumal cu' kai' nku' Matu'uwal.
talan na' nanabakis ko' olo'laqi' na' kinabahan ka ini qabaq 'i' komal co' kai' nko' Mato'owal.
S.TRANSL: 眼看年輕人已不會說自己的語言，

S.FORM: yani cubalay 'i' masa'utu' 'i' magluglug 'i' matas cu' kai' nku' Matu'uwal ku' nanabakis. mana'aring 'i' pasibaq cu' ulu'laqi' na' kinabahan ku' pinatas naha'.
yani cobalay 'i' masa'oto' 'i' magloglog 'i' matas co' kai' nko' Mato'owal ko' nanabakis. mana'aring 'i' pasibaq co' olo'laqi' na' kinabahan ko' pinatas naha'.
S.TRANSL: 令耆老感到非常憂心，常聚集努力的編輯教材，也用心地以這個教材教導本族的孩子，

S.FORM: asiki makarux nanaq ku' ulu'laqi' na' kinabahan ta' 'i' makibaq cku' kai' niya' nanaq la ga,
asiki makarox nanaq ko' olo'laqi' na' kinabahan ta' 'i' makibaq cko' kai' niya' nanaq la ga,
S.TRANSL: 只要本族的孩子自發性的學習自己的母語，

S.FORM: naki' 'i' kumgalgalaying ku' kai' nku' Matu'uwal. naki' ani kanuwan ga iqat 'i' pakapawng ku' kai' nku' Matu'uwal.
naki' 'i' komgalgalaying ko' kai' nko' Mato'owal. naki' ani kanowan ga iqat 'i' pakapawng ko' kai' nko' Mato'owal.
S.TRANSL: 才能展現出族語的活力，族語才能永續長存。

S.FORM: Cingan i' Taping ga capaang na' ralu' cunga' ga Mabawtu'an. ralu' na' Tuiya' ga Matu'an. ralu' na' Cingan cunga' ga Matu'an ini ga Sisweykeng san naha'.
Cingan i' Taping ga capaang na' ralo' conga' ga Mabawto'an. ralo' na' Toiya' ga Mato'an. ralo' na' Cingan conga' ga Mato'an ini ga Sisweykeng san naha'.
S.TRANSL: 清安村大坪部落傳統部落稱之為Mabawtu’an漢名稱為馬都安，清安舊名為馬都安社、洗水坑。

S.FORM: tiku ralu' na' Cingan ga, minaralu' na' Itaal cunga'. kakian ka hani ga, maghaghap kiya' i' raya' nku' tigianan na' gawng na' Tayku' ru kiya' i' raya' nku' tigiil na' gawng na' Mayhing.
tiko ralo' na' Cingan ga, minaralo' na' Itaal conga'. kakian ka hani ga, maghaghap kiya' i' raya' nko' tigianan na' gawng na' Tayko' ro kiya' i' raya' nko' tigiil na' gawng na' Mayhing.
S.TRANSL: 此舊名之馬都安社本為番社名，該地散居大湖溪上游右岸和洗水溪﹝清安溪﹞上游左岸，因而得名；

S.FORM: yani ku' sinralu'an naha' la. minuwah cku' tatuhi ka cuquliq ga minang cku' gawng na' Mayhing. yani san maha' kakian na' Sisueikeng.
yani ko' sinralo'an naha' la. minowah cko' tatohi ka coqoliq ga minang cko' gawng na' Mayhing. yani san maha' kakian na' Sisoeikeng.
S.TRANSL: 遠來本地洗水溪線開墾的客人，泛稱本區為洗水坑。

S.FORM: kiya' ku' Gipun na' ga kahabag ka tinqalangan na' Itaal ga, kiya' cku' ighil ka' ragragiyax na' gawng na' Mayhing ku' qutuxqutux na' tinqalangan na' Itaal.
kiya' ko' Gipon na' ga kahabag ka tinqalangan na' Itaal ga, kiya' cko' ighil ka' ragragiyax na' gawng na' Mayhing ko' qotoxqotox na' tinqalangan na' Itaal.
S.TRANSL: 日據初，諸番社仗恃山脈之狹隘險要，經常出草襲擊，

S.FORM: papagyaiyun na' Gipun ku' Itaal la ru sinralu'an na' Gipun maha' Cingan la.
papagyaiyon na' Gipon ko' Itaal la ro sinralo'an na' Gipon maha' Cingan la.
S.TRANSL: 為日本平服驅離後，所以取名清安。

S.FORM: capaang na' ralu' nku' Paquwali' ga Mabawkian. 'i' yani 'i' sinralu'an nku' Matu'uwal ga Mabawkian ru tumuwang la ku' siputu' ru sinralu'an niya' maha' Paquwali'.
capaang na' ralo' nko' Paqowali' ga Mabawkian. 'i' yani 'i' sinralo'an nko' Mato'owal ga Mabawkian ro tomowang la ko' sipoto' ro sinralo'an niya' maha' Paqowali'.
S.TRANSL: 八卦真正的名稱為Mabawkian是汶水泰雅人最早稱的名字，被後來的客家人稱為八卦力，

S.FORM: sinubilan nku' nanabakis na' Mabawkian ga kumal maha' kiya' ku' qutux ka kahuniq ka kithu' ru payux a' qarax niya' ru kihma' a' abag niya'.
sinobilan nko' nanabakis na' Mabawkian ga komal maha' kiya' ko' qotox ka kahoniq ka kitho' ro payox a' qarax niya' ro kihma' a' abag niya'.
S.TRANSL: 傳說八卦山有一棵高大的樹，枝幹樹葉茂密，

S.FORM: kiya' cubalay cku' iglag ru talan kahabag ku' rawrawq. yani ku' balaiq cubalay 'i' kakian na' quwali'. tiku Itaal i' kiya' ga yani ku' san naha' maha' balaiq i' qubuwaan cu' quwali'.
kiya' cobalay cko' iglag ro talan kahabag ko' rawrawq. yani ko' balaiq cobalay 'i' kakian na' qowali'. tiko Itaal i' kiya' ga yani ko' san naha' maha' balaiq i' qobowaan co' qowali'.
S.TRANSL: 視野廣闊，是適合老鷹居住的好環境而得此名，當地的泰雅族人以此為捕獵老鷹的獵場。

S.FORM: Cinsuwei 'i' Tabilas ga, kiya' qutux ka lulyung cku' tinqalangan ru ralu' niya' ga Tapicwosi. makasawbih cku' ralu' na' tinqalangan.
Cinsowei 'i' Tabilas ga, kiya' qotox ka lolyong cko' tinqalangan ro ralo' niya' ga Tapicwosi. makasawbih cko' ralo' na' tinqalangan.
S.TRANSL: 錦水村的圓墩部落，因部落內有一條河川的名稱名為打比厝溪，接近部落名字的諧音而得名。

S.FORM: ralu' na' Itaal cucunga' ga Cagaw. muwah la ku' Sebu' na' Tuiya' la ga sinralu'an niya' maha' Bunsuy.
ralo' na' Itaal coconga' ga Cagaw. mowah la ko' Sebo' na' Toiya' la ga sinralo'an niya' maha' Bonsoy.
S.TRANSL: 更早以前傳統名稱為Cagaw，國民政府遷台便使用「汶水」Bunsuy為本地地名。

S.FORM: kiya' ku' kai' maha', Bunsuy ga maymuwang na' qusiya' san na' Tuiya' na' Siputu'.
kiya' ko' kai' maha', Bonsoy ga maymowang na' qosiya' san na' Toiya' na' Sipoto'.
S.TRANSL: 有此一說Bunsuy是漢族客籍的語詞，指為混濁的水的意思。

S.FORM: tiku Tayan Go i' Bari' ga, maqays cku' Sincu, Ilan, Taicung. patlalingayan kahabag ku' ragiyax ga yani cubalay a' capaang na' rahwal ku' Tayan Go i' Bari'.
tiko Tayan Go i' Bari' ga, maqays cko' Sinco, Ilan, Taicong. patlalingayan kahabag ko' ragiyax ga yani cobalay a' capaang na' rahwal ko' Tayan Go i' Bari'.
S.TRANSL: 苗栗縣泰安鄉位於新竹、宜蘭、台中的交界處群山環繞，是苗栗縣內最大的鄉鎮，

S.FORM: ragragiyax ru gawgawng ga, magbatunux cubalay ku' ragragiyax ru gawgawng.
ragragiyax ro gawgawng ga, magbatonox cobalay ko' ragragiyax ro gawgawng.
S.TRANSL: 除了豐富自然美景外，

S.FORM: yani wiy ku' capaang na' rahwal na' Itaal ku' Tayan i' Taywan kahi payux ku' ini packa' ka gaga cku' ragragiyax ka hani.
yani wiy ko' capaang na' rahwal na' Itaal ko' Tayan i' Taywan kahi payox ko' ini packa' ka gaga cko' ragragiyax ka hani.
S.TRANSL: 泰安鄉更是台灣泰雅族分布之重要鄉鎮，也因此在這山巔之鄉處處流露著截然不同的民族文化。

S.FORM: Maghaghap cku' Cingan, Paquwali' ru Cinsuwei ku' Matu'uwal. tugal ka hani ga, patlalingayan kahabag nku' magbatunux ru wihity ka ragragiyax.
Maghaghap cko' Cingan, Paqowali' ro Cinsowei ko' Mato'owal. togal ka hani ga, patlalingayan kahabag nko' magbatonox ro wihity ka ragragiyax.
S.TRANSL: 汶水人散居在清安村、八卦村和錦水村，三村被美麗山景環抱著，

S.FORM: kiya' ku' Sitawpangsan ru Yawposan 'i' kumal cku' kinqiyanux na' Itaal cunga'.
kiya' ko' Sitawpangsan ro Yawposan 'i' komal cko' kinqiyanox na' Itaal conga'.
S.TRANSL: 有訴說著泰雅生命傳說故事的細道邦山、鷂婆山，

S.FORM: kiya' ku' ibabawiq ka Ciyarisan ru iglag ka Holongsan ini ga Tinul ru Camaputing ka magbatunux ru mugumalaq cubalay.
kiya' ko' ibabawiq ka Ciyarisan ro iglag ka Holongsan ini ga Tinol ro Camapoting ka magbatonox ro mogomalaq cobalay.
S.TRANSL: 有高聳的佳里山及壯闊的橫龍山，還有俊秀的虎頭山和鳥嘴山，

S.FORM: babaw na' kaal ka ini baqi' cu' pakahicuwa' ka hamhum, manata' a' wagi', umyax a' wagi' ru manananaq ka pahpah.
babaw na' kaal ka ini baqi' co' pakahicowa' ka hamhom, manata' a' wagi', omyax a' wagi' ro manananaq ka pahpah.
S.TRANSL: 高深莫測的雲海、日出、日落；各式的花景，

S.FORM: qamisan ru gabagan ka tikay ga, sumqaquwalax a' kaal la ga, tatalan ku'qaym na' ngarux, pahpah na' pilikaway. gabagan ga, kiya' a' pahpah na' yutong, lamiquw ru ra' ka matanah. laxi cubalay 'i' sahuqi.

qamisan ro gabagan ka tikay ga, somqaqowalax a' kaal la ga, tatalan ko'qaym na' ngarox, pahpah na' pilikaway. gabagan ga, kiya' a' pahpah na' yotong, lamiqow ro ra' ka matanah. laxi cobalay 'i' sahoqi.
S.TRANSL: 冬春兩季的櫻花、李花，夏季gabagan的桐花、芒草，楓紅等美景更是不容錯過的。

S.FORM: tiku kaal ka hani ga, payux ku' cuquliq 'i' muwah 'i' maganaw i' Tayan. yani 'i' balaiq 'i' tatangaan ku' kinabalaiq a' kakian na' ulay.
tiko kaal ka hani ga, payox ko' coqoliq 'i' mowah 'i' maganaw i' Tayan. yani 'i' balaiq 'i' tatangaan ko' kinabalaiq a' kakian na' olay.
S.TRANSL: 除此之外，近幾年來廣為人知的泰安溫泉，亦是著名特色之一，

S.FORM: mayma' su' cku' magbatunux ka ulay na' makilux ga, papaqasun su' cubalay.
mayma' so' cko' magbatonox ka olay na' makilox ga, papaqason so' cobalay.
S.TRANSL: 在景色優美的溫泉區、泡著泉質極佳的溫泉，如此享受，

S.FORM: yani ku'capaang na' kinqiyanux na' itaal. kahi payux a' cuquliq 'i' muwah i' runi 'i' pasyasing.
yani ko'capaang na' kinqiyanox na' itaal. kahi payox a' coqoliq 'i' mowah i' roni 'i' pasyasing.
S.TRANSL: 乃人生一大美事，所以吸引了許多偶戲劇前來取景拍攝。

S.FORM: kiya' 'i' maqiyanux i' ragragiyax ku' Itaal. tiku gawng ru luliyung ga, yani a' capaang na' usalan 'i' cumbu' cu' qulih.
kiya' 'i' maqiyanox i' ragragiyax ko' Itaal. tiko gawng ro loliyong ga, yani a' capaang na' osalan 'i' combo' co' qolih.
S.TRANSL: 泰雅族主要生活在山區，因此，河流與溪流便是捕魚的場所，

S.FORM: muwani la ga tumuwang cu' payux tikay na' naniqun ru balaiq tikay a' kinqiyanux. yani ku' capaang na' kakyuman cu' nananiqun na' waw nku' Matu'uwal.
mowani la ga tomowang co' payox tikay na' naniqon ro balaiq tikay a' kinqiyanox. yani ko' capaang na' kakyoman co' nananiqon na' waw nko' Mato'owal.
S.TRANSL: 以此增加食物與生活的樂趣，捕魚便是汶水人重要的生產方式之一。

S.FORM: macka' cku' qawnan. qutuxqutux ka tinqalangan ga kiya' a' luliyung naha' cu' qulih nanaq ru asi baqibaqi a' qays naha'.
macka' cko' qawnan. qotoxqotox ka tinqalangan ga kiya' a' loliyong naha' co' qolih nanaq ro asi baqibaqi a' qays naha'.
S.TRANSL: 就如同獵場一樣，各部落皆有自己的魚場且界線明顯，

S.FORM: nanaq kiya' ku' minagawng na'qutuxqutux ka tinqalangan. qumlih ga,
nanaq kiya' ko' minagawng na'qotoxqotox ka tinqalangan. qomlih ga,
S.TRANSL: 甚至每一條溪分屬不同部落是不成文的規定，

S.FORM: kiya' ku' musa' nanaq ru qutux cu' glug asikina ga payux tikay ku' qutux cu' glug 'i' musa' 'i' rumkap cu' qulih.
kiya' ko' mosa' nanaq ro qotox co' glog asikina ga payox tikay ko' qotox co' glog 'i' mosa' 'i' romkap co' qolih.
S.TRANSL: 捕魚有個人與團體兩種，但以團體補魚居多，

S.FORM: yani cubalay ku' waw na' tinqalangan ka hani. qutuxqutux cu' kaal ka gabagan ga, masa'utu' i' luliyungng ku' Itaal.
yani cobalay ko' waw na' tinqalangan ka hani. qotoxqotox co' kaal ka gabagan ga, masa'oto' i' loliyongng ko' Itaal.
S.TRANSL: 是部落的重要活動之一，每年夏季族人匯聚在河邊，

S.FORM: tuba'an naha' na' tatuba' ku' qulih ru sipaqasug naha' cku' minuwah ka qutuxqutux ka itaal.
toba'an naha' na' tatoba' ko' qolih ro sipaqasog naha' cko' minowah ka qotoxqotox ka itaal.
S.TRANSL: 用魚藤汁麻醉魚類，參加的人都可以分到魚貨。

S.FORM: kiya' ku' a'aalan cu' qulih inha' ga, tapanaq, tataku', kawbu', pa' na' kawbu' ru naip.
kiya' ko' a'aalan co' qolih inha' ga, tapanaq, tatako', kawbo', pa' na' kawbo' ro naip.
S.TRANSL: 捕魚的魚具有魚叉、魚網、魚荃、架網與釣鉤等，

S.FORM: kiya' ku' rumkap cu' qulih ga, cumbu' na' tapanaq cu' qulih, humawb cu' qulih, umayng cu' qulih, tumuba' cu' qulih ru qumlih.
kiya' ko' romkap co' qolih ga, combo' na' tapanaq co' qolih, homawb co' qolih, omayng co' qolih, tomoba' co' qolih ro qomlih.
S.TRANSL: 至於補魚的方法則有射魚、叉魚、網魚、釣魚、毒魚和堰魚，

S.FORM: tiku tumuba' cu' qulih na' 'i' hiya' ga, lumamu' cu' tatuba i' ragiyax, siagal naha' cu' batunux ru paqupaqun han ru buqan cku' raya' na' luliyung.
tiko tomoba' co' qolih na' 'i' hiya' ga, lomamo' co' tatoba i' ragiyax, siagal naha' co' batonox ro paqopaqon han ro boqan cko' raya' na' loliyong.
S.TRANSL: 其中毒魚是將山上採集的毒藤用石頭打碎放入河中上游，待魚被麻醉浮出水面後，

S.FORM: lawaun tikay ru tatalan ku' tubaan ka qulih 'i' masqaqali' cku' luliyung.
lawaon tikay ro tatalan ko' tobaan ka qolih 'i' masqaqali' cko' loliyong.
S.TRANSL: 族人在下游撈魚，

S.FORM: umayng cu' qulih ru lumamu' cu' qulih i' kahu' na' luliyung. ma'aping ku' qusiya' la ga, mana'aring 'i' qumlih la. haga'an cu' batunux han ru sukuan cu' abag la ru sukuan cu' bunaqi' la.
omayng co' qolih ro lomamo' co' qolih i' kaho' na' loliyong. ma'aping ko' qosiya' la ga, mana'aring 'i' qomlih la. haga'an co' batonox han ro sokoan co' abag la ro sokoan co' bonaqi' la.
S.TRANSL: 而堰魚乃利用枯水季節， 先以石頭築堰再放入葉子和泥沙，

S.FORM: papuusalun ca buwinah ku' qusiya' la ru sukuan cu' kawbu' na' Itaal 'i' makahu' niya' la.
papoosalon ca bowinah ko' qosiya' la ro sokoan co' kawbo' na' Itaal 'i' makaho' niya' la.
S.TRANSL: 泰雅族人將魚筌放置在河的上游，引水導魚，在築堰的下游放魚筌接魚

S.FORM: ini packa ku' kaal ga ini pack ku' rumkap cu' qulih. tumuba cu' qulih ga tumuba' i' qamisan ka tikay ka qusiya'.
ini packa ko' kaal ga ini pack ko' romkap co' qolih. tomoba co' qolih ga tomoba' i' qamisan ka tikay ka qosiya'.
S.TRANSL: 補魚的方法因季節而不同，毒魚和堰魚約在秋冬枯水期時進行，

S.FORM: tumaku' cu' qulih ru panaip ga musa' 'i' rahwal a' qusiya'.
tomako' co' qolih ro panaip ga mosa' 'i' rahwal a' qosiya'.
S.TRANSL: 網魚和釣魚則在河水較充沛時進行，

S.FORM: ' i' minuwah ku' rahuwal ka qwalax ru bayhu ka tugal ini ga imagal cu' ri'ax ga, balaiq cubalay 'i' kumari'.
' i' minowah ko' rahowal ka qwalax ro bayho ka togal ini ga imagal co' ri'ax ga, balaiq cobalay 'i' komari'.
S.TRANSL: 尤其在大雨或颱風過後三至五天，最適合灑網，

S.FORM: pakapayux ku' mananananaq ka inagal ka qulih.
pakapayox ko' mananananaq ka inagal ka qolih.
S.TRANSL: 不僅魚獲量豐富種類也較多。

S.FORM: papatuwawun nku' Matu'uwal ga, paslahungun han ku' lahulahu ru pahangiqun la.
papatowawon nko' Mato'owal ga, paslahongon han ko' laholaho ro pahangiqon la.
S.TRANSL: 泰雅族的農耕先以焚墾再輪休山田為主，

S.FORM: tubuxan cu' turakis, pati' ru pumuwan cu' qatyai ru bunga'. mna'aring han ga pininangun ku' lahulahu han ru putungun ku' kahuniq la.
toboxan co' torakis, pati' ro pomowan co' qatyai ro bonga'. mna'aring han ga pininangon ko' laholaho han ro potongon ko' kahoniq la.
S.TRANSL: 農作物以小米、陸稻、玉米和甘藷為主，先將開墾原始林後砍伐大樹，

S.FORM: lawaun cu' malngu' la ga gisiyagan la. naqru' 'i' gumisiyag la ga sicululing la. lawaun cu' qutux cu' ahangiqan han ru mna'aring 'i' gumilbak.
lawaon co' malngo' la ga gisiyagan la. naqro' 'i' gomisiyag la ga sicololing la. lawaon co' qotox co' ahangiqan han ro mna'aring 'i' gomilbak.
S.TRANSL: 等到枯乾之後，闢除一定的範圍築出防火牆，然後放火燒山 ，約一星期後，

S.FORM: siutu' kahabag ku' ini kaculing ka kahuniq ru sihaga' kahabag ku' batunux.
sioto' kahabag ko' ini kacoling ka kahoniq ro sihaga' kahabag ko' batonox.
S.TRANSL: 將焚墾後未燒盡的樹根或枝條堆置在田地周圍，並將田地整平或作成作成一坵一坵的田地，

S.FORM: tiku qabuli' na' kiman ru kahuniq niya' la ga balaiq 'i' matagaxiryu la.
tiko qaboli' na' kiman ro kahoniq niya' la ga balaiq 'i' matagaxiryo la.
S.TRANSL: 燒後之草木作為灰肥，

S.FORM: lawaun tikay ru quminuwalax la ga mna'aring 'i' tumubux cu' turakis ru pati' ru mumuwa' cu' qatyai.
lawaon tikay ro qominowalax la ga mna'aring 'i' tomobox co' torakis ro pati' ro momowa' co' qatyai.

S.FORM: 'i' kiya' na tikay a' mamayah ga, pumuwaan tikay cu' bunga' wiy. rahwal tikay ku' tinubuxan la ga lumacu' la.
'i' kiya' na tikay a' mamayah ga, pomowaan tikay co' bonga' wiy. rahwal tikay ko' tinoboxan la ga lomaco' la.
S.TRANSL: 若還有些耕地也種一些甘藷，當新禾出現時，

S.FORM: lawaun tikay lawiy ru makatatigalan ru makabuway. lawaun ru tayhuk cu' magalpug cu' qun cu' buwating la ga kalhul la.
lawaon tikay lawiy ro makatatigalan ro makaboway. lawaon ro tayhok co' magalpog co' qon co' bowating la ga kalhol la.
S.TRANSL: 再開始拔草，直到11月稻穗成熟舉行收割祭，

S.FORM: mna'aring 'i' minang ru cumuling ru tubuxan la ru lahian 'i' makabuway ru kumlux ga, yani cubalay a' papatuwawun nku' Matu'uwal cubalay.
mna'aring 'i' minang ro comoling ro toboxan la ro lahian 'i' makaboway ro komlox ga, yani cobalay a' papatowawon nko' Mato'owal cobalay.
S.TRANSL: 自焚墾整田播種到中耕再到最後的收割就是泰雅族人最典型的傳統生產方式之一。

S.FORM: mana'aring cucunga' ga, kiya' ku' manananaq na' gaga ka muwag cu' tawki' na' tomuk cku' qutux na' tinqalangan.
mana'aring coconga' ga, kiya' ko' manananaq na' gaga ka mowag co' tawki' na' tomok cko' qotox na' tinqalangan.
S.TRANSL: 在很早以前，有一個部落存在著選舉頭目的文化，

S.FORM: capaang cubalay ku' tawki' na' tomuk ga, asiki kiya' ku' babalaiq na' inlungan, ini nahmuhmut maka'iwang 'i' kumal, ini nahmuhmut qumuriq cu' waw na' cuquliq,
capaang cobalay ko' tawki' na' tomok ga, asiki kiya' ko' babalaiq na' inlongan, ini nahmohmot maka'iwang 'i' komal, ini nahmohmot qomoriq co' waw na' coqoliq,
S.TRANSL: 說實在的，總頭目必須有善心，不胡亂欺騙別人，不偷竊，

S.FORM: ini nahmuhmut masa'ang cu' cuquliq. gumualu' cu' kanayril ru ulu'laqi', lungulungun ku' aruwa ka nanabakis. kiya' ku' inlungan niya' ka kinbalaiq 'i' musa' malahang ku' qutux ka tinqalangan.
ini nahmohmot masa'ang co' coqoliq. gomoalo' co' kanayril ro olo'laqi', longolongon ko' arowa ka nanabakis. kiya' ko' inlongan niya' ka kinbalaiq 'i' mosa' malahang ko' qotox ka tinqalangan.
S.TRANSL: 不隨便罵人， 關心妻子及小孩，回憶過逝的長者，他們的善心及於全部落族人，

S.FORM: baqun niya' ku' ima' ku' aqih ka cuquliq 'i' muwah 'i' humuwah ku' waw na' qutux na' tinqalangan.
baqon niya' ko' ima' ko' aqih ka coqoliq 'i' mowah 'i' homowah ko' waw na' qotox na' tinqalangan.
S.TRANSL: 他了解誰是惡者，將蓄意破壞部落。

S.FORM: kiya' ku' tawki' na' tomuk ku' qutux tinqalangan ta la ga,
kiya' ko' tawki' na' tomok ko' qotox tinqalangan ta la ga,
S.TRANSL: 當部落有了總頭目，

S.FORM: kiya' ku' pacacpung cu' waw ka qutux tinqalangan ga pungan nku' cuquliq ku' kai' niya', galgan naha' matawaw wiy.
kiya' ko' pacacpong co' waw ka qotox tinqalangan ga pongan nko' coqoliq ko' kai' niya', galgan naha' matawaw wiy.
S.TRANSL: 他必須仲裁部落事務，族人則聽命於他並追隨他的腳步，

S.FORM: ana naha' kasa'ngangun 'i' hiya' ga, ini anabah masa'ang, ini ciyuk wiy.
ana naha' kasa'ngangon 'i' hiya' ga, ini anabah masa'ang, ini ciyok wiy.
S.TRANSL: 不管人們如何責罵，他都不生氣也不回擊，

S.FORM: paca'ruxun naha' ku' tawki' na' tomuk ka gaga la ga, ma'usa' pakabalaiq ku' kinqiyanux na' tinqalangan nku' Matu'uwal la.
paca'roxon naha' ko' tawki' na' tomok ka gaga la ga, ma'osa' pakabalaiq ko' kinqiyanox na' tinqalangan nko' Mato'owal la.

S.FORM: kakian nku' Matu'uwal ga, kiya' cku' ibabawiq ka ragiyax. kiya' wiy ku' payux ka pinumuwa' naha' i' kiya'.
kakian nko' Mato'owal ga, kiya' cko' ibabawiq ka ragiyax. kiya' wiy ko' payox ka pinomowa' naha' i' kiya'.
S.TRANSL: 位處高海拔的汶水人居住地，亦擁有豐富農特產，

S.FORM: tikay ka gabagan ga, kiya' a' ihuk na' ragiyax, balku ru gabagan ga, kiya' a'qaym, pilikaway.
tikay ka gabagan ga, kiya' a' ihok na' ragiyax, balko ro gabagan ga, kiya' a'qaym, pilikaway.

S.FORM: tikay ka qamisan ga kiya' a' tomato, qamisan la ga kiya' a' iyuk, ralu' ru qurip.
tikay ka qamisan ga kiya' a' tomato, qamisan la ga kiya' a' iyok, ralo' ro qorip.
S.TRANSL: 秋季的番茄；冬季的柑橘、甜柿、生薑等，

S.FORM: payux ru mananananaq ku' pinumuwaw'. qutux cu' kaal ga pakiya' ku' linamuan.
payox ro mananananaq ko' pinomowaw'. qotox co' kaal ga pakiya' ko' linamoan.
S.TRANSL: 多樣豐富的農產品保證一年四季新鮮登場，

S.FORM: sawni la ga, kiya' ku' mhangiq na' babinasan cu' pinumuwa' cku' papaganawan na' Itaal.
sawni la ga, kiya' ko' mhangiq na' babinasan co' pinomowa' cko' papaganawan na' Itaal.
S.TRANSL: 目前已規劃的泰雅園區假日市集，

S.FORM: tiku pinumuwa' nku' Matu'uwal ga asiki na'aringi' cku' pinmuwaan ru tayhuk cku' papabaynay. papakitalan cku' muwah 'i' maganaw cku' papaganawan na' Itaal ku' pinumuwa' na' Itaal.
tiko pinomowa' nko' Mato'owal ga asiki na'aringi' cko' pinmowaan ro tayhok cko' papabaynay. papakitalan cko' mowah 'i' maganaw cko' papaganawan na' Itaal ko' pinomowa' na' Itaal.
S.TRANSL: 直接落實「從產地到消費者」，將好產品推廣給各地前來的旅客們。

S.FORM: bali' nanaq ku' balaiq a' niqun ru balaiq a' paganawan ru balaiq a' talan. kiya' na ka' papaganawan na' Itaal ka' gaga na' Itaal.
bali' nanaq ko' balaiq a' niqon ro balaiq a' paganawan ro balaiq a' talan. kiya' na ka' papaganawan na' Itaal ka' gaga na' Itaal.
S.TRANSL: 除了這些好吃還有好玩更有美景，還有泰雅園區的泰雅族文化館，

S.FORM: tiku hani ga, yani ku' laxi cubalay 'i' nahuqun ku' kinbalaiq na' gaga nku' Matu'uwal ni' isu'.
tiko hani ga, yani ko' laxi cobalay 'i' nahoqon ko' kinbalaiq na' gaga nko' Mato'owal ni' iso'.
S.TRANSL: 更是喜愛民族文化的你所不能錯過的，

S.FORM: manananaq ka patasan, sinbil na' nanabakis, hahilaw ru nananiqun ga, yani 'i' balaiq si' musa' 'i' maganaw ku' gaga na' Itaal.
manananaq ka patasan, sinbil na' nanabakis, hahilaw ro nananiqon ga, yani 'i' balaiq si' mosa' 'i' maganaw ko' gaga na' Itaal.

S.FORM: tiku kinbalaiq ka ragragiyax ru kinmatasiq ka gawgawng ga ini hikmi' cuqang na' cuquliq. nababalaiq sumku' ku' babalaiq na' a'angayan'.
tiko kinbalaiq ka ragragiyax ro kinmatasiq ka gawgawng ga ini hikmi' coqang na' coqoliq. nababalaiq somko' ko' babalaiq na' a'angayan'.

S.FORM: qutux cu' kaal ga, ini packu' ku' tatalan. mital su' cku' ruwas ka pinatas ga babaqun su' ku' a'usalan su'.
qotox co' kaal ga, ini packo' ko' tatalan. mital so' cko' rowas ka pinatas ga babaqon so' ko' a'osalan so'.
S.TRANSL: 四季皆有不同面貌風情；希望能藉由觀光手冊的資訊，將美景分享給更多朋友，

S.FORM: pakitali' ku' rawirawin su'. naki naha' baqun ku' a'uwah 'i' maganaw runi. muwah 'i' humakay cku' magbatunux ka rawrawq ka hani.
pakitali' ko' rawirawin so'. naki naha' baqon ko' a'owah 'i' maganaw roni. mowah 'i' homakay cko' magbatonox ka rawrawq ka hani.
S.TRANSL: 讓更多人擁有直接清楚的資訊，輕鬆進入這塊美麗的土地，

S.FORM: babaw niya' la ga, ma'uwah nanaq 'i' maganaw cku' kinbalaiq na' rawrawq.
babaw niya' la ga, ma'owah nanaq 'i' maganaw cko' kinbalaiq na' rawrawq.
S.TRANSL: 親身體驗這塊土地的美與好。

S.FORM: tiku ulay i' Tayan ga, kiya' i' syagsyag nku' luliyung na' Mayri'.
tiko olay i' Tayan ga, kiya' i' syagsyag nko' loliyong na' Mayri'.
S.TRANSL: 泰安溫泉位於汶水溪畔，

S.FORM: linuwaw na' tomuk na' tinqalangan na' Tabilas ku' quwang nku' ulay i' 1908 cu' kaal.
linowaw na' tomok na' tinqalangan na' Tabilas ko' qowang nko' olay i' 1908 co' kaal.
S.TRANSL: 民國前3年（1908年）原住民圓墩部落Tabilas頭目在橫龍山發現溫泉源頭，

S.FORM: magalayng han ku' siputu' 'i' muwah 'i' minang cku' Cinsuwei i' Tayan Go ru luwan naha' ku' ulay ka' asi hbu' kariariax.
magalayng han ko' sipoto' 'i' mowah 'i' minang cko' Cinsowei i' Tayan Go ro lowan naha' ko' olay ka' asi hbo' kariariax.
S.TRANSL: 光復初期入山開墾的客家人，來到了今日的泰安鄉錦水村，發現了源源不絕的溫泉，

S.FORM: Cinsuwei san na' siputu' maha' manamay ka qusiya'. yani ku' sinralu'an naha' ku' kai' maha' Cinsuwei. yani ku' sinralu' ka hani na.
Cinsowei san na' sipoto' maha' manamay ka qosiya'. yani ko' sinralo'an naha' ko' kai' maha' Cinsowei. yani ko' sinralo' ka hani na.
S.TRANSL: 因為客家語中的錦水就是「滾燙之水」的意思，

S.FORM: ulay na' Cinkuwangsancwang ga kiya' cku' ragiyax i' tagabagan na' Camaputing.
olay na' Cinkowangsancwang ga kiya' cko' ragiyax i' tagabagan na' Camapoting.
S.TRANSL: 所以將發現溫泉源頭的所在地改稱為「錦水村」，一直沿用至今。

S.FORM: linuwaw na' tomuk na' Tabilas nku' Matu'uwal i' 1908 cu' kaal. ralu' niya' ga Dulat na' Gaiun.
linowaw na' tomok na' Tabilas nko' Mato'owal i' 1908 co' kaal. ralo' niya' ga Dolat na' Gaion.
S.TRANSL: 而位於鳥嘴山（又稱上島山）北麓的警光山莊溫泉，是在（西元1908年）由汶水人「打必歷社頭目」（Dulat na’ Gaiun）所發現。

S.FORM: kinbalay na' Gipun ku' Cincalyawiangso i' 1908 cu' kaal. tiku ulay i' Tayan na' tagabagan ga kiya' cku' lulyung na' Mayri' na' uqu' ku' quwang na' ulay.
kinbalay na' Gipon ko' Cincalyawiangso i' 1908 co' kaal. tiko olay i' Tayan na' tagabagan ga kiya' cko' lolyong na' Mayri' na' oqo' ko' qowang na' olay.
S.TRANSL: 1908年，由日本殖民政府在此設立「警察療養所」，因為溫泉區北臨汶水溪谷，

S.FORM: Pantaw ku' uqu' ka hani ru sinralu'an na' Gipun maha' Sangtaw. yani ku' kai' maha' ulay na' Torayama'.
Pantaw ko' oqo' ka hani ro sinralo'an na' Gipon maha' Sangtaw. yani ko' kai' maha' olay na' Torayama'.
S.TRANSL: 河谷呈半島形狀於是日本人又稱之為「上之島」，故名為「上島溫泉」。

S.FORM: 'i' magyai ku' Gipun la ga, yani ku' sinralu'an na' kinsat maha' Cinmincawtayso. Minkwo 52 cu' kaal, tawki' na' tuiya' 'i' Huwang Ciye.
'i' magyai ko' Gipon la ga, yani ko' sinralo'an na' kinsat maha' Cinmincawtayso. Minkwo 52 co' kaal, tawki' na' toiya' 'i' Howang Ciye.
S.TRANSL: 當日本離開（台灣光復）之後，取名為警民招待所，民國52年，黃杰長官看到此處，

S.FORM: talan niya' ku' sug na' kakian ka hani ga masikura' cku' Tinul. yugun niya' ku' ralu' maha' ulay na' Tinul.
talan niya' ko' sog na' kakian ka hani ga masikora' cko' Tinol. yogon niya' ko' ralo' maha' olay na' Tinol.
S.TRANSL: 因其背朝向虎山，又將溫泉命名為「虎山溫泉」，

S.FORM: babaw niya' la ga, muwah 'i' Ciang. Cing. Kwo ru yugun niya' lawiy ku' ralu' maha' ulay na' Tayan.
babaw niya' la ga, mowah 'i' Ciang. Cing. Kwo ro yogon niya' lawiy ko' ralo' maha' olay na' Tayan.
S.TRANSL: 後來蔣故總統經國先生親臨此地，為了國泰民安，故重新更名為「泰安溫泉」。

S.FORM: qusiya' na' ulay na' Tayan ga, hawti', matasiq ru ukas a' kinsawkan niya'. kii' maspatul cu' mapitu' kimakilux niya'. sipayma' su' ku' qusiya' niya' ga, sikahawti' ru sikabalaiq na' hihihi' su'.
qosiya' na' olay na' Tayan ga, hawti', matasiq ro okas a' kinsawkan niya'. kii' maspatol co' mapito' kimakilox niya'. sipayma' so' ko' qosiya' niya' ga, sikahawti' ro sikabalaiq na' hihihi' so'.
S.TRANSL: 泰安溫泉水質潤滑，無色無臭，溫泉水溫約47度，沐浴之後肌膚潤滑舒爽，具有美容養顏的效果，素有美人湯之稱。

S.FORM: payux cubalay ku' ulay na' Cingan, Paquwali' ru Cinsuwei. kiya' na ku' tinqalangan na' Itaal ru tinqalangan na' Siputu' ka manananaq ka gaga.
payox cobalay ko' olay na' Cingan, Paqowali' ro Cinsowei. kiya' na ko' tinqalangan na' Itaal ro tinqalangan na' Sipoto' ka manananaq ka gaga.
S.TRANSL: 清安村、錦水村及八卦村，區內除了豐富溫泉資源外，還有泰雅部落、客家山城等多元文化特色，

S.FORM: kiya' wiy ku' tagliq ru hahakayan ka raniq. kaa' 'i' ungii' ku' balaiq i' papaganawan ka hani.
kiya' wiy ko' tagliq ro hahakayan ka raniq. kaa' 'i' ongii' ko' balaiq i' papaganawan ka hani.
S.TRANSL: 瀑布及步道等自然景觀，別忘了順路一遊這些熱門景點喔！

S.FORM: ini nahmuhmut 'i' manubwag cu' quwaw ku' Matu'uwal i' cunga'. ini karangi ku' kinabahan i' sawni ka manahmuhmut 'i' manubuwag.
ini nahmohmot 'i' manobwag co' qowaw ko' Mato'owal i' conga'. ini karangi ko' kinabahan i' sawni ka manahmohmot 'i' manobowag.
S.TRANSL: 以前汶水人是不隨便喝酒的，完全不同於現在的後代子孫，

S.FORM: quwaw nku' Matu'uwal ga, kinabalay na' nasayhu' ini ga turakis.
qowaw nko' Mato'owal ga, kinabalay na' nasayho' ini ga torakis.
S.TRANSL: 酒是由糯米或小米所釀製而成。

S.FORM: asiki maki cku' ri'ax ka sasaqasan ini ga kiya' ku' rahuwal na' waw. kabalay ru manubwag cu' quwaw ku' itaal.
asiki maki cko' ri'ax ka sasaqasan ini ga kiya' ko' rahowal na' waw. kabalay ro manobwag co' qowaw ko' itaal.
S.TRANSL: 不但在節慶而且重大事件，泰雅人才能一邊釀酒一邊喝酒，

S.FORM: nanuwan ku' kahabag ka sasaqasan?
nanowan ko' kahabag ka sasaqasan?
S.TRANSL: 那什麼叫節慶呢？

S.FORM: sumi'atu'
somi'ato'
S.TRANSL: 開工日

S.FORM: musa' 'i' sumqaqas 'i' papatawaw ku' giqas ka kaal. yani cubalay tayhuk la ku' sumi'atu' la. yani cubalay tayhuk la ku' sumi'atu' la.
mosa' 'i' somqaqas 'i' papatawaw ko' giqas ka kaal. yani cobalay tayhok la ko' somi'ato' la. yani cobalay tayhok la ko' somi'ato' la.
S.TRANSL: 為了快樂迎新年所做的工作才是真正的開工日，

S.FORM: manamanama' kabalay cu' quwaw ku' Matu'uwal. mamaliku na' 'i' hiya' ga, musa' 'i' qumaluwap.
manamanama' kabalay co' qowaw ko' Mato'owal. mamaliko na' 'i' hiya' ga, mosa' 'i' qomalowap.
S.TRANSL: 泰雅族人必預先釀酒，男生必須狩獵直到獵物滿滿亦或酒類備齊，

S.FORM: payux ku' tiniriq ka' qasinug ru kiya' kahabag ku' quwaw la ga, mana'aring malahang cku' gaga na' sumi'atu' la.
payox ko' tiniriq ka' qasinog ro kiya' kahabag ko' qowaw la ga, mana'aring malahang cko' gaga na' somi'ato' la.
S.TRANSL: 才能關注開工的習俗，這是令人高興的日子，

S.FORM: sasaqasan ku' ri'ax ka hani gi' usayng cu' ri'ax ini ga tugal cu' ri'ax 'i' maquwas, maniq ru manubwag cu' quwaw.
sasaqasan ko' ri'ax ka hani gi' osayng co' ri'ax ini ga togal co' ri'ax 'i' maqowas, maniq ro manobwag co' qowaw.
S.TRANSL: 因為一連舉行二至三日，是家家高興飲酒作樂的日子。

S.FORM: cumyus
comyos
S.TRANSL: 祭儀

S.FORM: cumyus na' 'i' hiya' ga, payux ku' kinalhan ka turakis, sumqaqas cu' pintuwawan ru qumaluwap. kurungu'un nku' Matu'uwal ku' Utux na' nanabakis ka aruwa'. maqilaap la.
comyos na' 'i' hiya' ga, payox ko' kinalhan ka torakis, somqaqas co' pintowawan ro qomalowap. korongo'on nko' Mato'owal ko' Utox na' nanabakis ka arowa'. maqilaap la.
S.TRANSL: 在小米豐收後舉行行祭儀，農事與狩獵令人滿意，以此緬懷泰雅祖靈。

S.FORM: makibaq cu' quwas na' nanabakis.
makibaq co' qowas na' nanabakis.
S.TRANSL: 學習泰雅古調

S.FORM: kiya' ku' ulaqi' ka marakyas ru sumi'wa' 'i' makibaq cu' quwas na' nanabakis ga,
kiya' ko' olaqi' ka marakyas ro somi'wa' 'i' makibaq co' qowas na' nanabakis ga,
S.TRANSL: 當孩子成年並且喜歡學習古調時，

S.FORM: manamanama' kabalay cu' quwaw ru kumurungu' ku' yutas niya' 'i' muwah 'i' maskakaru', manubwag cu' quwaw ru pasibaq cu' quwas na' nanabakis.
manamanama' kabalay co' qowaw ro komorongo' ko' yotas niya' 'i' mowah 'i' maskakaro', manobwag co' qowaw ro pasibaq co' qowas na' nanabakis.
S.TRANSL: 必須預先釀酒並邀請耆老聊天飲酒並指導學習泰雅古調。

S.FORM: tuminun nku' Matu'uwal ga, yani ku' balaiq cubalay. yani ku' kakanayril kahabag ku' tuminuk. tiku baq 'i' tuminuk ka kakanayril ga, yani ku' tanarahwalun naha' 'i' mital kahabag.
tominon nko' Mato'owal ga, yani ko' balaiq cobalay. yani ko' kakanayril kahabag ko' tominok. tiko baq 'i' tominok ka kakanayril ga, yani ko' tanarahwalon naha' 'i' mital kahabag.
S.TRANSL: 泰雅族人織布是最出色的絕活，紡織技術則是婦女社會地位高低的識別準則。

S.FORM: mana'aring ga mumuwa' cu' kgi' han ru rahwal la ga kumakgi' la.
mana'aring ga momowa' co' kgi' han ro rahwal la ga komakgi' la.
S.TRANSL: 婦女們從種植的苧麻上剝皮抽絲搓成麻線，

S.FORM: manaqru' kumakgi' la ga, bahqan naha' la ru pugingan naha' ru malngu' la ga knukaun naha' la ru kabalayun naha' cu' way la.
manaqro' komakgi' la ga, bahqan naha' la ro pogingan naha' ro malngo' la ga knokaon naha' la ro kabalayon naha' co' way la.
S.TRANSL: 先洗曬乾後捻線最後製成線，線與木薯一起煮，

S.FORM: tahqun naha' cku' kamti' ku' way. pugian lawiy ru qumalasay ru lamuun naha'.
tahqon naha' cko' kamti' ko' way. pogian lawiy ro qomalasay ro lamoon naha'.
S.TRANSL: 曬乾之後理經配色，

S.FORM: 'i' muwani' la ga, pakapayux a' mananananaq ka tininunan naha'. kabalayun naha' cku' qagungu' ru mana'aring 'i' tuminun.
'i' mowani' la ga, pakapayox a' mananananaq ka tininonan naha'. kabalayon naha' cko' qagongo' ro mana'aring 'i' tominon.
S.TRANSL: 如果這樣的話就會有很多的獨特圖案，排列在織布機上織成布匹。

S.FORM: makarux cubalay ku' kakanayril nku' Matu'uwal. magabuq ga tuminun han ru minaniq la ga, musa' 'i' matawaw la.
makarox cobalay ko' kakanayril nko' Mato'owal. magaboq ga tominon han ro minaniq la ga, mosa' 'i' matawaw la.
S.TRANSL: 泰雅婦女相當勤奮，白天需工作，通常利用清晨出門前織布，早餐過後便開始工作，

S.FORM: kahabag ku' tinqalangan ga, pungan kahabag ku' kagungu' maha' 'i' humanang. paqasun naha' cubalay gi makarux kahabag.
kahabag ko' tinqalangan ga, pongan kahabag ko' kagongo' maha' 'i' homanang. paqason naha' cobalay gi makarox kahabag.
S.TRANSL: 家家戶戶織布機碰撞聲，傳遍了部落間，因為他們非常愉快所以都很勤奮。

S.FORM: tuminun ka hani ga, tararahwalun nku' Matu'uwal mital kahabag. payux ku' baqun naha' ka gagagaga kahabag. ini qaniq cu' qaqahing na' waylung ru kakamil na' waylung.
tominon ka hani ga, tararahwalon nko' Mato'owal mital kahabag. payox ko' baqon naha' ka gagagaga kahabag. ini qaniq co' qaqahing na' waylong ro kakamil na' waylong.
S.TRANSL: 由於織布代表女子社會地位，因此衍生的忌諱也不少，比如不吃雞翅、雞爪，

S.FORM: ma'icug cu' paka'aqih ku' tininunan naha'. kakanayril na' 'i' hiya' ga, baq 'i' tuminun la ga capang na' mukurakis la.
ma'icog co' paka'aqih ko' tininonan naha'. kakanayril na' 'i' hiya' ga, baq 'i' tominon la ga capang na' mokorakis la.
S.TRANSL: 怕損及織成布的整齊。女孩會織布才能成為真正的女孩，

S.FORM: balaiq 'i' musa' maqiyanux nanaq la. minuqil la ga yani ku' musa' 'i' makital cku' nanabakis ka arwa'.
balaiq 'i' mosa' maqiyanox nanaq la. minoqil la ga yani ko' mosa' 'i' makital cko' nanabakis ka arwa'.
S.TRANSL: 也表示能夠獨立生活，死後必定會與祖先相見。

S.FORM: maliku ru kanayril na' Itaal ga, tayhuk ku' kaal naha' ka cacapungan na' nanabakis la ga, yani ku' mana'aringun 'i' mital ku' kinqiyanux naha' la.
maliko ro kanayril na' Itaal ga, tayhok ko' kaal naha' ka cacapongan na' nanabakis la ga, yani ko' mana'aringon 'i' mital ko' kinqiyanox naha' la.
S.TRANSL: 泰雅族的男女到了一個年紀就會經歷長輩們試探未來的生活。

S.FORM: mamaliku ga, magalpu cu' imagal cu' kaal ini ga magalpu cu' mamatu' cu' kaal la ga, talan nku' nanabakis naha' ku' kinqiyanux ru palhulhul na' linanglung naha'.
mamaliko ga, magalpo co' imagal co' kaal ini ga magalpo co' mamato' co' kaal la ga, talan nko' nanabakis naha' ko' kinqiyanox ro palholhol na' linanglong naha'.
S.TRANSL: 男生不是十五歲就是十六歲時，耆老們便會試探他們對未來是否有信心。

S.FORM: 'i' pintasan ku' raqinas naha' la ga, baq 'i' qumaluwap ru pasiwahi. turiq cu' waqanux, para, mit, bawak la ga, yani capang na' palhulruhu na' mamaliku na' Itaal.
'i' pintasan ko' raqinas naha' la ga, baq 'i' qomalowap ro pasiwahi. toriq co' waqanox, para, mit, bawak la ga, yani capang na' palholroho na' mamaliko na' Itaal.
S.TRANSL: 當臉上開始紋面之後，表示他們要學會狩獵及做陷阱，獵捕鹿、羌、羊、豬之後，才稱得上是真正的泰雅男人，

S.FORM: balaiq musa' kumiyun cu' pakaglu naha' ru baq maqiyanux nanaq wiy la.
balaiq mosa' komiyon co' pakaglo naha' ro baq maqiyanox nanaq wiy la.
S.TRANSL: 也可以尋找他們未來的伴侶並獨立生活，

S.FORM: siturahu kahabag na' qalaqalang ru sukuun ca kisiliq.
sitoraho kahabag na' qalaqalang ro sokoon ca kisiliq.
S.TRANSL: 將受到部落的敬重及懷念。

S.FORM: kakanayril ga, magalpu cu' sapat cu' kaal ru magalpu cu' imagal cu' kaal la ga, talan nku' nanabakis naha' ku' kinqiyanux nku' makurakis ku' linanglung naha'.
kakanayril ga, magalpo co' sapat co' kaal ro magalpo co' imagal co' kaal la ga, talan nko' nanabakis naha' ko' kinqiyanox nko' makorakis ko' linanglong naha'.
S.TRANSL: 女孩約到了十四至十五歲時，長輩會徵詢女孩的意見，

S.FORM: 'i' pintasan ku' raqinas naha' la ga, baq wiy tuminun, tumubux cu' turakis, kabalay cu' quwaw.
'i' pintasan ko' raqinas naha' la ga, baq wiy tominon, tomobox co' torakis, kabalay co' qowaw.
S.TRANSL: 一旦紋面之後，就要學會織布，剝小米、釀酒、

S.FORM: kumurungu cku' nanabakis ru wah 'i' manubuwag cu' quwaw. sumiwal ku' nanabakis la ga, yani capang na' magbatunux na' kakanayril na' Itaal.
komorongo cko' nanabakis ro wah 'i' manobowag co' qowaw. somiwal ko' nanabakis la ga, yani capang na' magbatonox na' kakanayril na' Itaal.
S.TRANSL: 認真服侍長輩並端上小酒，一經長被允諾，那才是真正美麗的泰雅女子，

S.FORM: siturahu kahabag na' qalaqalang ru sukuun ca balaiq na' ralu'.
sitoraho kahabag na' qalaqalang ro sokoon ca balaiq na' ralo'.
S.TRANSL: 將受到部落的敬重並取好名，

S.FORM: yani wiy ku' balaiq kiyumun na' maliku wiy.
yani wiy ko' balaiq kiyomon na' maliko wiy.
S.TRANSL: 如此，才是男人心中理想的對象。

S.FORM: kinbalay na' buwiqa' ka lubu' ga san nku' Matu'uwal maha' lubu'. umyup su' cu' lubu' ini ga tilubu' ga, hanang niya' ga ini ka ayhung.
kinbalay na' bowiqa' ka lobo' ga san nko' Mato'owal maha' lobo'. omyop so' co' lobo' ini ga tilobo' ga, hanang niya' ga ini ka ayhong.
S.TRANSL: 「口簧琴」是汶水人對竹製口琴的稱呼，用它吹彈出來的聲音簡單，

S.FORM: balaiq cubalay 'i' gumlug cku' quwas nku' Matu'uwal ku' lubu'. mananananaq ru balaiq pungan cubalay ku' hanang niya'.
balaiq cobalay 'i' gomlog cko' qowas nko' Mato'owal ko' lobo'. mananananaq ro balaiq pongan cobalay ko' hanang niya'.
S.TRANSL: 配合族人的歌謠音階使用，卻也十分悅耳、特殊。

S.FORM: payux tikay ku' kinbalay na' buwiqa' ka lubu'. hma' na' lubu' ga, sikabalay niya' cu' tihi' ru gkugan naha' ku' kaciyuciyu la ru bahlan na' sinyug la.
payox tikay ko' kinbalay na' bowiqa' ka lobo'. hma' na' lobo' ga, sikabalay niya' co' tihi' ro gkogan naha' ko' kaciyociyo la ro bahlan na' sinyog la.
S.TRANSL: 製作「口簧琴」的材料多半是竹片，琴身中間裝置金屬或簧片，另以一根細麻繩穿越，吹奏時用口腔含住簧片，

S.FORM: umyup la ga paskalgan ku' sinyug la. pasihuban ru yupan la ga payux ku' hanang niya' la.
omyop la ga paskalgan ko' sinyog la. pasihoban ro yopan la ga payox ko' hanang niya' la.
S.TRANSL: 再以右手彈線，吹吸之間，有不同音調產生。

S.FORM: nanabakis i' cunga' ga, balaiq nku' Matu'uwal ku' tilubu' 'i' musa' 'i' sumbalaiq cu' kakanayril ini ga mamaliku ru manhahiyu 'i' makal na' lubu'.
nanabakis i' conga' ga, balaiq nko' Mato'owal ko' tilobo' 'i' mosa' 'i' sombalaiq co' kakanayril ini ga mamaliko ro manhahiyo 'i' makal na' lobo'.
S.TRANSL: 傳統上泰雅人喜歡吹奏「口簧琴」來表達愛慕之意或宣洩情感，

S.FORM: ukas na ku' lubu' i' cunga' ga, wung! wung! maha' ku' hanang na' lubu' ga balaiq 'i' pungan cubalay.
okas na ko' lobo' i' conga' ga, wong! wong! maha' ko' hanang na' lobo' ga balaiq 'i' pongan cobalay.
S.TRANSL: 在往昔沒有其他樂器伴奏時，「口簧琴」的「嗡嗡」調子確實是原始且動人的。

S.FORM: asikina ga ini kapayux 'i' tilubu' ku' Matu'uwal ka hani la. kiya' tikay na ku' nabakis ka humaynas cku' maymal cu' kaal 'i' baq 'i' tilubu' na.
asikina ga ini kapayox 'i' tilobo' ko' Mato'owal ka hani la. kiya' tikay na ko' nabakis ka homaynas cko' maymal co' kaal 'i' baq 'i' tilobo' na.
S.TRANSL: 不過，目前能吹奏「口簧琴」的族人不多，五十歲以上的老者還存有一些，

S.FORM: ayhung cubalay san na' kinabahan nku' Matu'uwal ku' musa' 'i' makibaq cu' tilubu'.
ayhong cobalay san na' kinabahan nko' Mato'owal ko' mosa' 'i' makibaq co' tilobo'.
S.TRANSL: 而年輕人認為學習吹「口簧琴」太難，

S.FORM: musa' 'i' sumbalaiq na' lubu' ku' kanayril ru maliku ga, asiga ini tatuhi' cuqang maha' ku' kinabahan nku' Matu'uwal.
mosa' 'i' sombalaiq na' lobo' ko' kanayril ro maliko ga, asiga ini tatohi' coqang maha' ko' kinabahan nko' Mato'owal.
S.TRANSL: 用它來表達情意，也太間接了。

S.FORM: macka' cku' Itaal ku' Matu'uwal. imuwaag ga, gumlug cku' qutux cu' glug 'i' maqiyanux.
macka' cko' Itaal ko' Mato'owal. imowaag ga, gomlog cko' qotox co' glog 'i' maqiyanox.
S.TRANSL: 汶水人就如同泰雅族一樣，認為家是共同生活的團體，

asiga qomalowap, tomobon co' nanabakis ini ga waw ka bowinah. okas ko' maha' iso' nanaq asiki maglog ko' qotox co' imowaag.
S.TRANSL: 舉凡狩獵、祭祀或其他活動，通常不以個人為單位而是以家為單位，

S.FORM: kiya' ku' maglug 'i' maqiyanux ka qutux cu' imuwaag ga san naha' maha' imuwaag. san nku' Matu'uwal maha' qutux cu' imuwaga ini ga qutux cu' naniqan.
kiya' ko' maglog 'i' maqiyanox ka qotox co' imowaag ga san naha' maha' imowaag. san nko' Mato'owal maha' qotox co' imowaga ini ga qotox co' naniqan.
S.TRANSL: 因此有所謂同住於一家屋之親族團體稱為「家庭」，汶水稱之為一家人或同一個餐廳。

S.FORM: imuwaag na' 'i' hiya' ga, kiya' 'i' yaba', yaya' ru matasasuway. mauwah 'i' tumuwang cku' imuwaag na' cuquliq ga iqat a' qutux cu' imuwaag.
imowaag na' 'i' hiya' ga, kiya' 'i' yaba', yaya' ro matasasoway. maowah 'i' tomowang cko' imowaag na' coqoliq ga iqat a' qotox co' imowaag.
S.TRANSL: 家由家長及子女組成，寄居不算家屬，

S.FORM: ukas wiy ku' ralu' na' imuwaag. pakaal ta' ku' ralu' ta' ga, asiki tuwangan ku' ralu' ni' yaba' ru yaya' su'.
okas wiy ko' ralo' na' imowaag. pakaal ta' ko' ralo' ta' ga, asiki towangan ko' ralo' ni' yaba' ro yaya' so'.
S.TRANSL: 家沒有可用來表示的姓，要表示個人時就在自己的名字後面加上父親或母親的名字，

S.FORM: yani capaang na' ralu' su'. imuwaag ga qutux cu' kinbakisan iqat a' kahabag.
yani capaang na' ralo' so'. imowaag ga qotox co' kinbakisan iqat a' kahabag.
S.TRANSL: 家通常只有一代不是數代所組成，

S.FORM: ini pasasi'ahal ku' qumisuwan na' kanayril ru suway na' kanayril ini ga qumisuwan na' maliku ru suway na' maliku.
ini pasasi'ahal ko' qomisowan na' kanayril ro soway na' kanayril ini ga qomisowan na' maliko ro soway na' maliko.
S.TRANSL: 若未婚的姊妹或兄弟，

S.FORM: tayhuk cku' masasiahal ku' matasasuway la ga, asiki matagik cku' a'usa' niya' ka giqas ka imuwaag ini ga kabalay cu' giqas na' imuwaag nanaq.
tayhok cko' masasiahal ko' matasasoway la ga, asiki matagik cko' a'osa' niya' ka giqas ka imowaag ini ga kabalay co' giqas na' imowaag nanaq.
S.TRANSL: 結婚後必須進入他家或興建房屋，家產，

S.FORM: tiku sinubilan na' rawrawq na' nanabakis ga, bali' wawaw nku' qumisuwan na' maliku kahabag waw nku' minasasuway kahabag ga.
tiko sinobilan na' rawrawq na' nanabakis ga, bali' wawaw nko' qomisowan na' maliko kahabag waw nko' minasasoway kahabag ga.
S.TRANSL: 非長子繼承而是由所有子女共同繼承。

S.FORM: talan nku' Matu'uwal ku' masiglug ga, magabatunux ku' kisiliq. asiki haynasun ku' pincapngan la ga, yani san maha' naqalun la ku' capaang na' rahwal na' waw la.
talan nko' Mato'owal ko' masiglog ga, magabatonox ko' kisiliq. asiki haynason ko' pincapngan la ga, yani san maha' naqalon la ko' capaang na' rahwal na' waw la.
S.TRANSL: 泰雅人視婚姻為神聖且須經過考驗才能完成的大事。

S.FORM: mhngiq ku' kakanayril ru mamaliku ga, maskakaru' cku' paysan ka waw ga pisaniq nku' Matu'uwal cubalay.
mhngiq ko' kakanayril ro mamaliko ga, maskakaro' cko' paysan ka waw ga pisaniq nko' Mato'owal cobalay.
S.TRANSL: 平時年輕男女在一起，以性為話題閒聊被當成是禁忌，

S.FORM: manahmuhmut 'i' tumimuk cku' kakanayril ku' mamaliku ga, asiki talan na' tomuk ru humibag cu' bawak ru maskakaru 'i' manubuwag ru tumubun cu' cuquliq maha' mnahuk kuwing cubalay.
manahmohmot 'i' tomimok cko' kakanayril ko' mamaliko ga, asiki talan na' tomok ro homibag co' bawak ro maskakaro 'i' manobowag ro tomobon co' coqoliq maha' mnahok kowing cobalay.

S.FORM: marakyas ku' mamaliku ru kakanayril nku' Matu'uwal ga, rarasun nku' nanabakis ku' mamaliku ru kakanayril kahabag cku' imuwaag na' tomuk.
marakyas ko' mamaliko ro kakanayril nko' Mato'owal ga, rarason nko' nanabakis ko' mamaliko ro kakanayril kahabag cko' imowaag na' tomok.

pincapngan na' homgob ko' gaga na' marakyas. mana'aring 'i' manobowag, maqowas ro yogi'.
S.TRANSL: 並由巫師主持成年禮儀式，然後飲酒，歌舞狂歡，

S.FORM: muwani la ga, pakababaq ku' mamaliku' ru kakanayril ru maglug 'i' yugi'.
mowani la ga, pakababaq ko' mamaliko' ro kakanayril ro maglog 'i' yogi'.
S.TRANSL: 如此，男女也將會互相認識交誼一起共舞。

S.FORM: ini nata 'i' ragiyax ku' wagi' na ga, minamakarakyas ka mamaliku nku' Matu'uwal ga, rarima' musa' 'i' qumaluwap i' lahulahu, kakanayril na' 'i' hiya ga, tuminun i' imuwaag,
ini nata 'i' ragiyax ko' wagi' na ga, minamakarakyas ka mamaliko nko' Mato'owal ga, rarima' mosa' 'i' qomalowap i' laholaho, kakanayril na' 'i' hiya ga, tominon i' imowaag,
S.TRANSL: 第二天日出前，接受成年禮的男族人便上山打獵，（不過）女性則留在家中織布、

S.FORM: tumquwaw ru kabalay cu' tinabiq ru numaga' ku' siwaan niya' ka maliku 'i' muwah i' imuwaag.
tomqowaw ro kabalay co' tinabiq ro nomaga' ko' siwaan niya' ka maliko 'i' mowah i' imowaag.

S.FORM: babaw niya' la ga, mapanga' cu' qaqasinug ku' mamaliku la ga, yani cubaly san na' kakanayril maha' mugumalaq ka lawlawkah.
babaw niya' la ga, mapanga' co' qaqasinog ko' mamaliko la ga, yani cobaly san na' kakanayril maha' mogomalaq ka lawlawkah.

homaynas wiy la ko' marakyas ka gaga la ga, balaiq 'i' masasi'ahag la.

gaga nko' Mato'owal ga macka' cko' Itaal. asiga momowa' co' wawaw ro qomalowap ka imoliq na' waw ga patowawon nko' mamaliko,

S.FORM: kakanayril na' 'i' hiya' ga, matawaw cku' tuminun, malahang cku' imuwaag niya' ka lihika na' waw.
kakanayril na' 'i' hiya' ga, matawaw cko' tominon, malahang cko' imowaag niya' ka lihika na' waw.
S.TRANSL: 不過女孩，則負責織布、家計…等較輕鬆的工作，

S.FORM: ukas ku' capaang na' galgalgan nku' Matu'uwal. tiku ma'ubu' ka qutux cu' imuwaag ga, gumlug cku' gaga na' Matu'uwal.
okas ko' capaang na' galgalgan nko' Mato'owal. tiko ma'obo' ka qotox co' imowaag ga, gomlog cko' gaga na' Mato'owal.
S.TRANSL: 汶水人無法律的觀念，複雜的家族是以所謂法律或規準來規範，

S.FORM: asiga kinqiyanux, sumnawaw ru gaga nku' qutux cu' imuwaag ga, yani ku' kai' nku' nanabakis ka aruwa' ku' galgalgan naha' cubalay.
asiga kinqiyanox, somnawaw ro gaga nko' qotox co' imowaag ga, yani ko' kai' nko' nanabakis ka arowa' ko' galgalgan naha' cobalay.

S.FORM: san maha' qutux cu' glug ga, kiya' ku' qutux ka' sumnawaw naha' ka Utux na' Babaw na' Kaal.
san maha' qotox co' glog ga, kiya' ko' qotox ka' somnawaw naha' ka Utox na' Babaw na' Kaal.

S.FORM: masa'utu' kahabag ku' Utux na' Babaw na' Kaal ka hani ru inha' ga nanabakis ka aruwa'.
masa'oto' kahabag ko' Utox na' Babaw na' Kaal ka hani ro inha' ga nanabakis ka arowa'.
S.TRANSL: 神靈是由死去的祖先所組成，

S.FORM: tiku gaga na' galgalgan ru pisaniq ga, yani capaang na' kai' na' nanabakis ka aruwa'.
tiko gaga na' galgalgan ro pisaniq ga, yani capaang na' kai' na' nanabakis ka arowa'.

kiya' ko' galgalgan nko' Mato'owal cko' qotoxqotox ka gaga. somnawagon nko' Mato'owal ko' gaga maha',
S.TRANSL: 每一個法律或規準有其成員所必須遵循的價值，

S.FORM: na'uququun la ku' gaga ka sumnawaw ga, ma'uwah ku' aqih na' waw cku' Matu'uwal ka hani ru qutux cu' glug naha'.
na'oqoqoon la ko' gaga ka somnawaw ga, ma'owah ko' aqih na' waw cko' Mato'owal ka hani ro qotox co' glog naha'.
S.TRANSL: 人們相信一旦違背了共同的價值信仰，災禍必定降靈到個人及其他的團體成員。

S.FORM: kiya' ku' qutux cu' glug, tumok ru Utux na' Babaw na' Kaal. asiga gaga na' kinqiyanux,
kiya' ko' qotox co' glog, tomok ro Utox na' Babaw na' Kaal. asiga gaga na' kinqiyanox,

kinhabgan, nabakis, mawxa' ro manahoqil ini ga qotox co' kaal ka tatobonan, qomalowap, malakam ro mahahakas ga, kiya' cko' gaga kahabag.

S.FORM: mamaliku ru kakanayril nku' Matu'uwal ga, tayhuk cku' mamaspat ru mamaqisug cu' kaal la ga, pahakun ku' gi'nux na' ququlun ini ga gi'nux ani inu'.
mamaliko ro kakanayril nko' Mato'owal ga, tayhok cko' mamaspat ro mamaqisog co' kaal la ga, pahakon ko' gi'nox na' qoqolon ini ga gi'nox ani ino'.
S.TRANSL: 汶水的男女到了八、九的年齡時，門牙或其他牙齒鬆動時，

S.FORM: qwian na' sinyug ru paskalgan na' itaal ku' mahuk ka gi'nux. mamati' ku' gi'nux ga, kiya' wiy ku' situting na' sug na' takis ru paskalgan na' sinyug ku' gi'nux.
qwian na' sinyog ro paskalgan na' itaal ko' mahok ka gi'nox. mamati' ko' gi'nox ga, kiya' wiy ko' sitoting na' sog na' takis ro paskalgan na' sinyog ko' gi'nox.
S.TRANSL: 會將鬆動的牙齒用繩子綁住後拔起，若牙齒太硬就以番刀的背敲打再用繩子拔起，

S.FORM: sipakati naha' i' rinamuwag ku' mahuk ka gi'nux iwana' yani a' gubbul naha'. ini naha' nahahamti' 'i' pakati' ku' mahuk ka' gi'nux.
sipakati naha' i' rinamowag ko' mahok ka gi'nox iwana' yani a' gobbol naha'. ini naha' nahahamti' 'i' pakati' ko' mahok ka' gi'nox.
S.TRANSL: 並將牙齒丟向屋頂，就好像是埋葬一般，汶水人不會將拔掉的牙齒隨意亂丟。

S.FORM: gaga nku' Matu'uwal cucunga ku' umuhak cu' gi'nux. umuhak cu' gi'nux ka waw ka hani ga, asiki uhakun ni' yaba' ki' yaya' ku' gi'nux naha'.
gaga nko' Mato'owal coconga ko' omohak co' gi'nox. omohak co' gi'nox ka waw ka hani ga, asiki ohakon ni' yaba' ki' yaya' ko' gi'nox naha'.
S.TRANSL: 拔牙自古以來就是汶水群的習俗，拔牙的工作是由父母執行，

S.FORM: gini'un la ga masyaq ku' ulaqi' na' kanayril ga balaiq talan san na' nanabakis. yani wiy ku' san na' sinubilan cu' kai' na' nanabakis ka aruwa' maha' magbatunux cubalay.
gini'on la ga masyaq ko' olaqi' na' kanayril ga balaiq talan san na' nanabakis. yani wiy ko' san na' sinobilan co' kai' na' nanabakis ka arowa' maha' magbatonox cobalay.
S.TRANSL: 耆老認為拔牙的女孩笑時顯得美麗，祖訓也早已明示。

S.FORM: gi'nux na' ulaqi' na' kanayril nku' Matu'uwal ka inuhak ga, asiki nabalaiqun 'i' gumbul cku' rinamuwag na' imuwaag.

S.TRANSL: 汶水群的女孩拔掉的牙齒必須妥善埋在屋頂，

S.FORM: ini patapanga ku' gi'nux na' ulaqi' na' kanayril la ga, iwana' matubah 'i' maqiyanux lawiy ku' itaal.
ini patapanga ko' gi'nox na' olaqi' na' kanayril la ga, iwana' matobah 'i' maqiyanox lawiy ko' itaal.

S.FORM: sunawagun nku' Matu'uwal maha' gini'un ga macka' cku' ginisuna' na' itaal.
sonawagon nko' Mato'owal maha' gini'on ga macka' cko' ginisona' na' itaal.
S.TRANSL: 因為汶水人相信，牙齒是生命的一部分，

S.FORM: babaw niya' la ga, pakabalaiq ku' kinabahan nku' Matu'uwal.
babaw niya' la ga, pakabalaiq ko' kinabahan nko' Mato'owal.
S.TRANSL: 將來必定庇蔭汶水人的後代子孫。

S.FORM: maglug ki' Itaal ku' kinqiyanux nku' qumaluwap. musa' 'i' qumaluwap ku' mugumalaq ka lawlawkah ga, maras cu' qaqaluwap ka xuwil, sawki',
maglog ki' Itaal ko' kinqiyanox nko' qomalowap. mosa' 'i' qomalowap ko' mogomalaq ka lawlawkah ga, maras co' qaqalowap ka xowil, sawki',
S.TRANSL: 狩獵與泰雅族的生活息息相關，出去打獵的勇士們，會攜帶獵犬、刀、

S.FORM: sinbangan ru sulaq ka kinabalay nanaq. mung ku' kai' na' capaang na' tawki' na' qaqaluwap ku' mugumalaq ka lawlawkah.
sinbangan ro solaq ka kinabalay nanaq. mong ko' kai' na' capaang na' tawki' na' qaqalowap ko' mogomalaq ka lawlawkah.
S.TRANSL: 矛和自製獵槍，聽從獵團領導者的指示。

S.FORM: sumilma' cu' qaqaluwap ka qaraqarax ru asiki maglug wiy cku' pisaniq na' qumaluwap ru nababalaiq 'i' patuwawun ku' aqih a' kabahniq ka gaga.
somilma' co' qaqalowap ka qaraqarax ro asiki maglog wiy cko' pisaniq na' qomalowap ro nababalaiq 'i' patowawon ko' aqih a' kabahniq ka gaga.
S.TRANSL: 除了準備武器，必定要遵守狩獵的禁忌，並且做好鳥占的儀式，

S.FORM: naqalun kahabag ku' waw la ga, mana'aring 'i' kumyum cu' qasinug i' lahulahu.
naqalon kahabag ko' waw la ga, mana'aring 'i' komyom co' qasinog i' laholaho.
S.TRANSL: 一切準備好之後，開始在山林中尋找獵物，

S.FORM: asiga bawak na' lahulahu, para' na' lahulahu, mit na' lahulahu, waqanux na' lahulahu ru kabahniq na' lahulahu.
asiga bawak na' laholaho, para' na' laholaho, mit na' laholaho, waqanox na' laholaho ro kabahniq na' laholaho.
S.TRANSL: 例如山豬、山羌、山羊、鹿及野禽，

S.FORM: manaqru' 'i' qumaluwap ru tayhuk i' imuwaag ku' mugumalaq ka lawlawkah la ga, manamanama' 'i' sumilma' cu' balaiq ka quwaw ru naniqun.
manaqro' 'i' qomalowap ro tayhok i' imowaag ko' mogomalaq ka lawlawkah la ga, manamanama' 'i' somilma' co' balaiq ka qowaw ro naniqon.
S.TRANSL: 當狩獵回來，族人會準備豐盛的酒及食物慶功，

S.FORM: payux ku' tiniriq naha' ga, musa' 'i' siputurahug ru sipaquwas na' itaal ku' mugumalaq ka lawlawkah.
payox ko' tiniriq naha' ga, mosa' 'i' sipotorahog ro sipaqowas na' itaal ko' mogomalaq ka lawlawkah.
S.TRANSL: 並對狩獵有功的族人，以英雄式的崇拜與歌頌。

S.FORM: tiku yugi' na' qaqaluwap ga marangi' cku' qumaluwap. yugi' na' qaqaluwap ka hani ga,
tiko yogi' na' qaqalowap ga marangi' cko' qomalowap. yogi' na' qaqalowap ka hani ga,
S.TRANSL: 獵舞乃模擬打獵的過程，以舞蹈的方式呈現，

S.FORM: yani cubalay 'i' musa' 'i' sipturahug ru musa' 'i' sumqaqas ku' mugumalak ka lawlawkah na' Itaal.
yani cobalay 'i' mosa' 'i' siptorahog ro mosa' 'i' somqaqas ko' mogomalak ka lawlawkah na' Itaal.
S.TRANSL: 表現獵者的英勇與族人的歡迎情景，

S.FORM: yugi' na' qaqaluwap ka waw ga, kuruma' ga nanabakis ru mamaliku ru kakanayril ka ini usa' 'i' qumaluwap.
yogi' na' qaqalowap ka waw ga, koroma' ga nanabakis ro mamaliko ro kakanayril ka ini osa' 'i' qomalowap.
S.TRANSL: 參加者大都為耆老及未參加狩獵的男女族人，

S.FORM: masiyatu' cu' siyatu' na' qumaluwap ru humabuk cu' qaraqarax na' yugi'. inha'ga, kahuniq, luhung, tutoh, batakan, tatinuk, qasuw, sali' ru buhinug.
masiyato' co' siyato' na' qomalowap ro homabok co' qaraqarax na' yogi'. inha'ga, kahoniq, lohong, totoh, batakan, tatinok, qasow, sali' ro bohinog.
S.TRANSL: 穿著打獵服飾，配戴舞具例如木、臼、煙斗、竹筒、織布機、杵和弓箭……等，

S.FORM: mamaliku ru kakanayril na' nanabakis ru tawtawki' ga, matahunak 'i' maskakaru' gi pana'aring 'i' yugi' la.
mamaliko ro kakanayril na' nanabakis ro tawtawki' ga, matahonak 'i' maskakaro' gi pana'aring 'i' yogi' la.
S.TRANSL: 男女長老和頭目坐著聊天因為要開始跳舞了，

S.FORM: tiku yugi' na' qaqaluwap na' tinqayawan ga, balaiq 'i' makibaq. capaang na' yugi na' qaqaluwap ga, mastatayl 'i' taqayaw ru mayhul,
tiko yogi' na' qaqalowap na' tinqayawan ga, balaiq 'i' makibaq. capaang na' yogi na' qaqalowap ga, mastatayl 'i' taqayaw ro mayhol,
S.TRANSL: 舞步簡單易學，以跳踏步、

S.FORM: mastatayl 'i' tigianan ru tigiil ru mayhul, mascaciyuk'i' mastatayl ru mayhul ku' kukuy ru siqunun ku' kukuy 'i' mastatayl.
mastatayl 'i' tigianan ro tigiil ro mayhol, mascaciyok'i' mastatayl ro mayhol ko' kokoy ro siqonon ko' kokoy 'i' mastatayl.
S.TRANSL: 左右跳踏步、跳踏併步、雙腳跳步為主要舞步。

S.FORM: tatangaan ga, san nku' Matu'uwal maha' mugumalaq ka lawlawkah. kiya' cku' ibabawiq ka pakabalay 'i' wahan na' cuquliq na' tinqalangan ku' tatangaan. talan ga asiga ini baqi' masikuwing.
tatangaan ga, san nko' Mato'owal maha' mogomalaq ka lawlawkah. kiya' cko' ibabawiq ka pakabalay 'i' wahan na' coqoliq na' tinqalangan ko' tatangaan. talan ga asiga ini baqi' masikowing.
S.TRANSL: 瞭望台可以視為泰雅人尚武勇猛的表徵，它高聳地豎立在部落的出入口，看起來像威武的不可侵犯。

S.FORM: baq cubalayi 'i' macbu' ku' Matu'uwal i' cunga'. tatangaan ka hani ga, tarakagan niya' ku' tinqalangan na' Itaal.
baq cobalayi 'i' macbo' ko' Mato'owal i' conga'. tatangaan ka hani ga, tarakagan niya' ko' tinqalangan na' Itaal.
S.TRANSL: 往昔泰雅族人擅戰，瞭望台是具有維護部落族人安全的警戒點，

S.FORM: kiya' cku' ibabawiq ru balaiq 'i' ngangayan i' tatuhi'. babaqun ku' ik ru latanux na' tinqalangan. kabalay cu' tatangaan ga capaang na' waw cubalay.
kiya' cko' ibabawiq ro balaiq 'i' ngangayan i' tatohi'. babaqon ko' ik ro latanox na' tinqalangan. kabalay co' tatangaan ga capaang na' waw cobalay.
S.TRANSL: 同時居高遠望，部落裡外的狀況易於掌握，因此瞭望台的設置十分重要。

S.FORM: kinbalay na' raramug, buwiqa' ru kahuniq ku' tatangaan. caqruxun ku' kahuniq ru buwiqa' ru alan cu' laluking.
kinbalay na' raramog, bowiqa' ro kahoniq ko' tatangaan. caqroxon ko' kahoniq ro bowiqa' ro alan co' laloking.
S.TRANSL: 瞭望台的建造以茅草，竹子，木頭等為主，以木或竹當成柱子架高，

S.FORM: samagan na' raramug ku' babaw na'imuwaag. matigia'uwah na' tinqalangan ru kabalayan cu' buwinah na' hakri' na' buwiqa' naki balaiq 'i' makarakyas ru maqahquwaw.
samagan na' raramog ko' babaw na'imowaag. matigia'owah na' tinqalangan ro kabalayan co' bowinah na' hakri' na' bowiqa' naki balaiq 'i' makarakyas ro maqahqowaw.
S.TRANSL: 上面再蓋茅草，面向進部落的方向，製作竹梯才得以上下。

S.FORM: capaang ka balaiq na' tatangaan ga, kabalay cku' ik na' tatangaan ku' lupung. mhngiq ga, balaiq'i' maniq cu' makilux ka naniqun.
capaang ka balaiq na' tatangaan ga, kabalay cko' ik na' tatangaan ko' lopong. mhngiq ga, balaiq'i' maniq co' makilox ka naniqon.
S.TRANSL: 比較講究些的瞭望台，內部還設置了簡易火爐，平時使用熱食，

S.FORM: qamisan la ga, qumubuwang ku' Matu'uwal cku' ibabawiq ka tatangangan. gihak ku' bayhu ru mahwiq ku' rilu'.
qamisan la ga, qomobowang ko' Mato'owal cko' ibabawiq ka tatangangan. gihak ko' bayho ro mahwiq ko' rilo'.
S.TRANSL: 冬天來臨，擔任「衛兵」的族人，高高在上，風寒露濕，

S.FORM: tatangaan ka hani ga, balaiq 'i' malah ru papagyaiyun ku' gihak. yani ku' san nku' Matu'uwal maha' kinbalaiq na' wawaw.
tatangaan ka hani ga, balaiq 'i' malah ro papagyaiyon ko' gihak. yani ko' san nko' Mato'owal maha' kinbalaiq na' wawaw.
S.TRANSL: 還可以用來烤火驅寒，也是非常好的一種設計。

S.FORM: pungan ku' kai' na' nanabakia cunga' ga ukas a' itaal 'i' mkababaw na' rawq na. kiya' ku' payux ka ragragiyax ka ibabawiq.
pongan ko' kai' na' nanabakia conga' ga okas a' itaal 'i' mkababaw na' rawq na. kiya' ko' payox ka ragragiyax ka ibabawiq.
S.TRANSL: 傳說在還沒有人類的遠古時代，有數座特別突出的高山，

S.FORM: kiya' ku' qutux ka rahwal cubalay a' lalapak na' batunux cku' mickacka nku' ragiyax. aqih gi imuliq cubalay ku' lalapak kahi manababalaiq 'i' makiya' cku' ba'nux na' ragiyax.
kiya' ko' qotox ka rahwal cobalay a' lalapak na' batonox cko' mickacka nko' ragiyax. aqih gi imoliq cobalay ko' lalapak kahi manababalaiq 'i' makiya' cko' ba'nox na' ragiyax.
S.TRANSL: 高山間有一巨大的石塊，因為沉重所以穩坐在山頂平坦處。

S.FORM: kiya' ku' qutux ka riax ga, masa'a'utu' kahabag ku' pinababutuan na' qaqasinug ru kakabahniq.
kiya' ko' qotox ka riax ga, masa'a'oto' kahabag ko' pinababotoan na' qaqasinog ro kakabahniq.
S.TRANSL: 某日，山頂上來了許多的鳥類與野獸，

S.FORM: pirarawiqan naha' kahbag ku' rahwal na' lalapak ru makal kahabag.
pirarawiqan naha' kahbag ko' rahwal na' lalapak ro makal kahabag.
S.TRANSL: 大家看著巨石議論紛紛，

S.FORM: ini kii'asug ru kumal ku' kakabahniq kahabag maha' ima' ku' mnahway 'i' umiwi cku' rahwal ka lalapak ru siruruwag cku' yaik ka uqu' ga yani a' salaw ta maha' capaang na' tawki' na' qaqasinug.
ini kii'asog ro komal ko' kakabahniq kahabag maha' ima' ko' mnahway 'i' omiwi cko' rahwal ka lalapak ro sirorowag cko' yaik ka oqo' ga yani a' salaw ta maha' capaang na' tawki' na' qaqasinog.
S.TRANSL: 一段時間後，群鳥決定，誰若能將這個巨石移動，並且推落至谷底，我們將封牠為動物群中的領袖。

S.FORM: mna'aring 'i' kiya' la ru ma'a'ingat cu' capaang na' lawlawkah ru manaqutuxqutux 'i' mnatalan 'i' rumuruwag cku' lalapak.
mna'aring 'i' kiya' la ro ma'a'ingat co' capaang na' lawlawkah ro manaqotoxqotox 'i' mnatalan 'i' romorowag cko' lalapak.
S.TRANSL: 於是大家為了爭奪領袖的位置，一個一個開始嘗試去移動這塊巨石，

S.FORM: aqih gi imuliq cubalay cu' rahwal ku' lalapak ru ukas a' mnahway 'i' umiwi' cku' lalapak ka yani.
aqih gi imoliq cobalay co' rahwal ko' lalapak ro okas a' mnahway 'i' omiwi' cko' lalapak ka yani.
S.TRANSL: 但是因為巨石太沉重，沒有動物能夠推動那塊大石頭。

S.FORM: asi uwah i' ragiyax ku' taquw ru sisiliq. yani ku' taquw ku' mnaqhing 'i' tumatat nku' qaqahing niya' ru manbahag cku' lalapak.
asi owah i' ragiyax ko' taqow ro sisiliq. yani ko' taqow ko' mnaqhing 'i' tomatat nko' qaqahing niya' ro manbahag cko' lalapak.
S.TRANSL: 此時烏鴉與希利克鳥也來到了山頂。烏鴉先展開牠那結實的翅膀，飛向巨石，

S.FORM: mnamatimati 'i' umatuk nku' a'atuk niya' ru kumamil nku' kakamil niya' cku' lalapak. ini niya' uhngiq ru namamatiun niya' 'i' rumuruwag ku' lalapak.
mnamatimati 'i' omatok nko' a'atok niya' ro komamil nko' kakamil niya' cko' lalapak. ini niya' ohngiq ro namamation niya' 'i' romorowag ko' lalapak.
S.TRANSL: 並以強韌的尖嘴及粗壯的腳爪，不停用力的推著巨石，

S.FORM: asikina ga ani tikay ga ini pawi' ku' lalapak ka hani. ma'uway ku' kisiliq niya' ru asi niya' laxi la.
asikina ga ani tikay ga ini pawi' ko' lalapak ka hani. ma'oway ko' kisiliq niya' ro asi niya' laxi la.
S.TRANSL: 可是巨石沒有一點搖晃，最後，烏鴉盡疲力竭 只好放棄。

S.FORM: tiku tikay ka sisiliq ga maki cku' bih niya' mital cku' taquw 'i' rumuruwag cku' lalapak. lumanglung wiy maha' maki 'i' rumuruwag cku' lalapak wiy.
tiko tikay ka sisiliq ga maki cko' bih niya' mital cko' taqow 'i' romorowag cko' lalapak. lomanglong wiy maha' maki 'i' romorowag cko' lalapak wiy.
S.TRANSL: 小小的希利克鳥在旁觀看後，起身欲嘗試推動巨石，

S.FORM: tiku kiya' 'i' lalalingay 'i' umangay ka kakabahniq ru qaqasinug ga, talan naha' ku' sisiliq ka tikay a' hihihi' niya' ru pasiyaqan naha' kahabag.
tiko kiya' 'i' lalalingay 'i' omangay ka kakabahniq ro qaqasinog ga, talan naha' ko' sisiliq ka tikay a' hihihi' niya' ro pasiyaqan naha' kahabag.
S.TRANSL: 此時在四週觀看的鳥類與獸群們，看到希利克鳥的小身軀，一副弱不禁風的樣子，

S.FORM: ini naha' snuwawi ku' pinasiya' nku' kakabahniq ru qaqasinug. mnapusal 'i' mingaq ru manbahag 'i' cku' babaw nku' rahwal ka lalapak ku' sisiliq.
ini naha' snowawi ko' pinasiya' nko' kakabahniq ro qaqasinog. mnaposal 'i' mingaq ro manbahag 'i' cko' babaw nko' rahwal ka lalapak ko' sisiliq.
S.TRANSL: 便引起一陣嘲笑聲。希利克鳥並不在意別人的眼光，牠尖叫二聲，飛向巨石。

S.FORM: ini kaingasug ru asi uwah kahabag ku' ini baqi a' lalapgan ka sisiliq. sipaglug naha' kahabag 'i' rumuruwag cku' ubah ku' lalapak. ini baqibaqi ru shwagun naha' cku' luhi ku' lalapak la.
ini kaingasog ro asi owah kahabag ko' ini baqi a' lalapgan ka sisiliq. sipaglog naha' kahabag 'i' romorowag cko' obah ko' lalapak. ini baqibaqi ro shwagon naha' cko' lohi ko' lalapak la.
S.TRANSL: 一瞬間 ！ 成千上萬的希利克鳥從四處飛來，牠們齊力推動巨石，巨石緩緩移動到山崖邊，一會兒，巨大石塊便滾落至山谷。

S.FORM: msihwag ku' lalapak ga humanang cubalay ru makasirusa' la ku' lalapak.
msihwag ko' lalapak ga homanang cobalay ro makasirosa' la ko' lalapak.
S.TRANSL: 當巨石落地時發出了巨大的聲響，分裂成兩塊，

S.FORM: tiku maksirusa' la ga asi psibuka' 'i' kiya' ku' itaal ka qutux ku' mamaliku ru qutux ku' kanayril. san naha' maha' yani ku' kinhabgan na' Itaal.
tiko maksirosa' la ga asi psiboka' 'i' kiya' ko' itaal ka qotox ko' mamaliko ro qotox ko' kanayril. san naha' maha' yani ko' kinhabgan na' Itaal.
S.TRANSL: 從裂開的石縫中，走出了一男一女，傳說他們就是泰雅族人始祖。

S.FORM: Itaal ga, tayhuk lawiy ku' tatubunan cu' ausa' 'i' kumut cu' tunux na' cuquliq.
Itaal ga, tayhok lawiy ko' tatobonan co' aosa' 'i' komot co' tonox na' coqoliq.
S.TRANSL: 又到了泰雅族馘首祭儀的季節……

S.FORM: capaang na' qumisuwan na' maliku na' tawki' ga maras cu' mugumalaq ka lawlawkah na' Itaal.
capaang na' qomisowan na' maliko na' tawki' ga maras co' mogomalaq ka lawlawkah na' Itaal.
S.TRANSL: 頭目的長子帶領著精銳勇猛的族人，

S.FORM: gabiyan ga, ini salui' 'i' mital ku' imagal ka tatiluling ga, kahabag ku' Itaal ga, asi ga buweng 'i' maup cku' tinqalangan na' qaricuwal.
gabiyan ga, ini saloi' 'i' mital ko' imagal ka tatiloling ga, kahabag ko' Itaal ga, asi ga boweng 'i' maop cko' tinqalangan na' qaricowal.
S.TRANSL: 趁著伸手不見五指的漆黑夜晚，一行人猶如黃蜂般的衝鋒進入敵人部落，

S.FORM: ini kaingasug ru pungan 'i' sumihung kahabag ku' Itaal. tunux na' qaricuwal ga, manaqutuxqutux 'i' maup kahabag cku' mugumalaq ka lawlawkah na' Itaal.
ini kaingasog ro pongan 'i' somihong kahabag ko' Itaal. tonox na' qaricowal ga, manaqotoxqotox 'i' maop kahabag cko' mogomalaq ka lawlawkah na' Itaal.
S.TRANSL: 彈指之間，哀叫聲此起彼落，敵人的頭顱一個個應聲落入泰雅勇士手中。

S.FORM: mugumalaq ka lawlawkah na' Itaal ga, muwah 'i' imuwaag la ga, tiku cumpung cu' wawaw na' tawki' ga sinababalaiq niya' 'i' kumal cku' tawki' ku' insalan naha' 'i' magalakam.
mogomalaq ka lawlawkah na' Itaal ga, mowah 'i' imowaag la ga, tiko compong co' wawaw na' tawki' ga sinababalaiq niya' 'i' komal cko' tawki' ko' insalan naha' 'i' magalakam.
S.TRANSL: 當勇士帶著大隊人馬凱旋歸回後，擔任指揮官的長子向頭目詳實報告戰果，

S.FORM: tiku Itaal ga, paqasun naha' cubalay ku' inusa' naha' 'i' magalakam. kanayril ru ulu'laqi' ga, paqasun naha' wiy ku' mugumalaq ka lawlawkah ka minusa' 'i' magalakam.
tiko Itaal ga, paqason naha' cobalay ko' inosa' naha' 'i' magalakam. kanayril ro olo'laqi' ga, paqason naha' wiy ko' mogomalaq ka lawlawkah ka minosa' 'i' magalakam.
S.TRANSL: 人莫不沈浸在勝利的喜悅中，婦人及孩童更為勇士的馘首成果歡欣鼓舞，

S.FORM: kiya' qutux ku' kanayril nku' mugumalaq ka lawlawkah ga, ini niya' tali' nanaq ku' maliku niya' nababalaiqun na' Itaal 'i' mital ku' tunux ka inaras naha' ru aqih gi maubu' cuqang la ru kahi naha' 'i' nauquun 'i' kumut nanaq ku' glug naha' la.

kiya' qotox ko' kanayril nko' mogomalaq ka lawlawkah ga, ini niya' tali' nanaq ko' maliko niya' nababalaiqon na' Itaal 'i' mital ko' tonox ka inaras naha' ro aqih gi maobo' coqang la ro kahi naha' 'i' naoqoon 'i' komot nanaq ko' glog naha' la.
S.TRANSL: 但在此時有一位勇士的妻子卻遍尋不著自己的丈夫。族人仔細清查獵回的頭顱，竟發現在激烈的戰鬥中，有人誤殺了自己部落中的勇士，

S.FORM: kanayril nku' mugumalaq ka lawlawkah ga, mingilis ru asi niya' gibai' ku' tunux na' maliku niya'.
kanayril nko' mogomalaq ka lawlawkah ga, mingilis ro asi niya' gibai' ko' tonox na' maliko niya'.
S.TRANSL: 勇士的妻子抱著頭顱痛哭失聲，

S.FORM: aqih a' kisiliq ru minglis ku' Itaal na' ga, kumaal ku' tawki' maha' babaw niya' 'i' musa 'i' magalakam lawiy ga, asiki patiqan ku' lihuw ru qangi nku' mugumalaq ka lawlawkah kahabag la.
aqih a' kisiliq ro minglis ko' Itaal na' ga, komaal ko' tawki' maha' babaw niya' 'i' mosa 'i' magalakam lawiy ga, asiki patiqan ko' lihow ro qangi nko' mogomalaq ka lawlawkah kahabag la.
S.TRANSL: 當族人心中哀傷時，酋長做了決定：「以後出擊馘首時，每個勇士要用炭灰在額頭與下額抹黑，作為辨別，以防誤殺事件再發生。」

S.FORM: naki makababaq kahabag ku' mugumalaq ka lawlawkah la. naki ini nauqui' 'i' kumut ku' glug ta' nanaq.
naki makababaq kahabag ko' mogomalaq ka lawlawkah la. naki ini naoqoi' 'i' komot ko' glog ta' nanaq.
S.TRANSL: 之後族人以此作為榮譽的象徵，要獲得紋面的封賜，

S.FORM: babaw niya' la ga kiya' la ku' patiqan ka gaga na' Itaal la. yani cubalay a' paqasun na' Itaal ku' patiqan la.
babaw niya' la ga kiya' la ko' patiqan ka gaga na' Itaal la. yani cobalay a' paqason na' Itaal ko' patiqan la.
S.TRANSL: 之後族人以此作為榮譽的象徵，要獲得紋面的封賜，

S.FORM: wana makipatiqan su' ga, mamaliku na' 'i' hiya ga, asiki kuminut cu' tunux na' cuquliq ru kakanayril na' 'i' hiya' ga asiki baq 'i' tuminuk cu' siyatu' la ga, yani a' balaiq 'i' patiqan ku' raqinas naha' la.

wana makipatiqan so' ga, mamaliko na' 'i' hiya ga, asiki kominot co' tonox na' coqoliq ro kakanayril na' 'i' hiya' ga asiki baq 'i' tominok co' siyato' la ga, yani a' balaiq 'i' patiqan ko' raqinas naha' la.

aqih gi lawkah cobalay a' hihihi' niya'. mnaxaliq 'i' tomoting ga pasilohi kahabag a' rawrawq.
S.TRANSL: 所以獵人們很討厭他，但因為他實在是太強壯了，

S.FORM: masang kahabag ku' qaqaluwap ga asikina ga calngun naha' kahabag ku' kisliq naha'.
masang kahabag ko' qaqalowap ga asikina ga calngon naha' kahabag ko' kisliq naha'.
S.TRANSL: 只要一揮拳就可以打掉山頭，所以獵人們即使生氣也只能隱忍，

S.FORM: makaal kahabag ku' qaqaluwap maha' 'i' kyumawnay ta' cu' qutux cu' paka'aqih niya' ru tutingaw ta 'i' hiya'.
makaal kahabag ko' qaqalowap maha' 'i' kyomawnay ta' co' qotox co' paka'aqih niya' ro totingaw ta 'i' hiya'.
S.TRANSL: 因此獵人們私下決定，有機會一定要好好修理他。

S.FORM: asikina ga balaiq kahabag nku' kakanayril ru' ulu'laqi' nku' tinqalangan gi lawkah cubalay 'i' Hasi.
asikina ga balaiq kahabag nko' kakanayril ro' olo'laqi' nko' tinqalangan gi lawkah cobalay 'i' Hasi.

S.FORM: mahananu ga sihakri niya' ku' qaba' niya' ru hakayan kahabag nku' ulu'laqi'.
mahanano ga sihakri niya' ko' qaba' niya' ro hakayan kahabag nko' olo'laqi'.
S.TRANSL: 因為他會舉起結實強壯的手臂當做大橋讓孩子們走

S.FORM: mhananu ga gawahan niya' ku' kmu na' qaba' niya' ru ca'alxan nku' ulu'laqi' ru liliqun niya' ku' ulu'laqi' 'i' babawiq ru paqasun cubalay nku' ulu'laqi' maha' asiga manbahag ta' cubalay i' kaal.
mhanano ga gawahan niya' ko' kmo na' qaba' niya' ro ca'alxan nko' olo'laqi' ro liliqon niya' ko' olo'laqi' 'i' babawiq ro paqason cobalay nko' olo'laqi' maha' asiga manbahag ta' cobalay i' kaal.
S.TRANSL: 他也會讓孩子們站在手心上並高高舉起手臂，讓孩子們直上雲霄。

S.FORM: mhananu 'i' Hasi ga balaiq niya' ku' rumag cku' kakanayril 'i' matawaw ru lumiliq cu' qusiya' 'i' musa' paqusiya'. mahangal cku' a' imuliq ka wawaw.
mhanano 'i' Hasi ga balaiq niya' ko' romag cko' kakanayril 'i' matawaw ro lomiliq co' qosiya' 'i' mosa' paqosiya'. mahangal cko' a' imoliq ka wawaw.
S.TRANSL: 而他也總是幫助婦女做農事、捧水灌溉、扛起沉重的東西，所以部落中的婦人及小孩把他當做朋友。

S.FORM: kahi 'i' kumaal kahabag ku' tinqalangan nku' kaknayril ru' ulu'laqi' maha' alay ta' cu' rawin 'i' Hasi.
kahi 'i' komaal kahabag ko' tinqalangan nko' kaknayril ro' olo'laqi' maha' alay ta' co' rawin 'i' Hasi.

S.FORM: kiya' ku' qutux ka ri'ax. 'i' Hasi ka hani ga balaiq naha' ru sumsa'sang naha' gi usalan niya' 'i' tumimuk cku' kakanayril nku' tinqalangan.
kiya' ko' qotox ka ri'ax. 'i' Hasi ka hani ga balaiq naha' ro somsa'sang naha' gi osalan niya' 'i' tomimok cko' kakanayril nko' tinqalangan.

payox ko' linaglong naha' kahabag ga aqih gi rahwal cobalay ro lawkah 'i' Hasi ro iqat naha' gagnahway ro asi naha' laxiy kiya' la.

babaw niya' la ga kiya' ko' qotox ka lawkah ka mogomalaq maha' Hasi ga payox a' aqih niya' ro balaiq niya' ko' omingat co' kinrahman na' coqoliq.

S.FORM: mana'aring ga, asiki marangi ta' cku' cunga' 'i' musa' 'i' qumaluwap.

nagaaw ta' ko' qasinog 'i' tomahing 'i' Hasi cko' ik na' ragiyax. tiko qasinog ga pa'asi glog cko' raniq 'i' magyai cko' ik na' ragiyax.

iko paqalowap ga mnkoh lawiy maha' kii' ini ka iqat ta' gagnahway ko' waw ka hani ga.

S.TRANSL: 哪有能力取女孩呢？於是也說

S.FORM: " bali' 'i' kuwing cubalay a' lawkah. capaang na' lawkah ga qawlit. 'i' hiya' ga maki' cku' ququququng na' qaniriang ga baqun niya' 'i' gumikug kahabag. "
" bali' 'i' kowing cobalay a' lawkah. capaang na' lawkah ga qawlit. 'i' hiya' ga maki' cko' qoqoqoqong na' qaniriang ga baqon niya' 'i' gomikog kahabag. "
S.TRANSL: 「其實我不是最厲害的，最厲害的是老鼠，他可以在我牆腳下鑽洞」。

S.FORM: tapaputing cubalay la ga muwah ku' qawlit la. lumanglung maha' 'i' kuwing a' capaang na' mugumalaq ka lawlawkah.
tapapoting cobalay la ga mowah ko' qawlit la. lomanglong maha' 'i' kowing a' capaang na' mogomalaq ka lawlawkah.
S.TRANSL: 最後老鼠來了，他覺得自己是最強的勇士，並且得意的開始吹牛

S.FORM: mana'aring 'i' kiya' 'i' manbayra' ru maghahuwa'. tiku cuquliq kahabag ga snuwawun naha' ku' qawlit.
mana'aring 'i' kiya' 'i' manbayra' ro maghahowa'. tiko coqoliq kahabag ga snowawon naha' ko' qawlit.
S.TRANSL: 當所有的人都相信老鼠厲害的同時

S.FORM: qutux ka mugumalaq ka lawlawkah ga kiya' 'i' makasug niya' ku' takiis niya' ru haraqun niya' ku' takiis ru' sicbu' niya' cku' qawlit ru manahuqil ku' qawlit la.
qotox ka mogomalaq ka lawlawkah ga kiya' 'i' makasog niya' ko' takiis niya' ro haraqon niya' ko' takiis ro' sicbo' niya' cko' qawlit ro manahoqil ko' qawlit la.
S.TRANSL: ，一位少年悄悄的從身後拔出箭，射向正在吹噓的老鼠。老鼠先生就這樣死了

S.FORM: talan nku' nanabakis nku' mukurakis ku' mugumalaq ka lawlawkah ka yani ru kumaal maha' tiku mugumalaq ka lawlawkah ka hani ga 'i' hiya' cubalay a' lawkah.
talan nko' nanabakis nko' mokorakis ko' mogomalaq ka lawlawkah ka yani ro komaal maha' tiko mogomalaq ka lawlawkah ka hani ga 'i' hiya' cobalay a' lawkah.
S.TRANSL: 因此，女孩的父母看見此情此景當場宣布這位少年就是最強的人

S.FORM: pa'asi' mu biqani' cku' mugumalaq ka lawlawkah ku' ulaqi' mu na' kanayril.
pa'asi' mo biqani' cko' mogomalaq ka lawlawkah ko' olaqi' mo na' kanayril.
S.TRANSL: 因此就把女兒嫁給他。

S.FORM: mana'aring i' cunga ga, rarima 'i' maqiyanux cku' ik na' ragragiyax ku' nanabakis na' Itaal ka aruwa', ani ma'way kinqiyanux naha' ga, baq cubalay 'i' maqiyanux.
mana'aring i' conga ga, rarima 'i' maqiyanox cko' ik na' ragragiyax ko' nanabakis na' Itaal ka arowa', ani ma'way kinqiyanox naha' ga, baq cobalay 'i' maqiyanox.
S.TRANSL: 泰雅的祖先早在很久以前已住在深山，即使生活清苦但他們都很會生活。

S.FORM: payux cubalay ku' kinbaqan naha', ini nahmuhmut 'i' maqiyanux. kiya' ku' raniq naha' ru kiya' ku' balaiq na' gaga ka galgalgan naha' 'i' makibaq 'i' maqiyanux.
payox cobalay ko' kinbaqan naha', ini nahmohmot 'i' maqiyanox. kiya' ko' raniq naha' ro kiya' ko' balaiq na' gaga ka galgalgan naha' 'i' makibaq 'i' maqiyanox.
S.TRANSL: 他們智慧足，不揮霍度日，不僅擁有好的計劃，也有可依循學習的生活智能。

S.FORM: san maha' sumi'atu' ga, iqat tikay na' waw cku' kinqiyanux na' Itaal, asiki nababalay ta' 'i' gumlug ku' gaga ka hani la ga, ma'usa' kiya' ku' balaiq na' kinalhan ta la.
san maha' somi'ato' ga, iqat tikay na' waw cko' kinqiyanox na' Itaal, asiki nababalay ta' 'i' gomlog ko' gaga ka hani la ga, ma'osa' kiya' ko' balaiq na' kinalhan ta la.
S.TRANSL: 開工儀式對泰雅族而言不是一件小事，必須實踐遵行這樣的儀式，未來才有豐碩的收穫。

S.FORM: tayhuk ku' tubuxan cu' turakis ga, asiki muwah i' imuwaag kahabag ku' qutux cu' imuwaag ru qutux cu' naniqan.
tayhok ko' toboxan co' torakis ga, asiki mowah i' imowaag kahabag ko' qotox co' imowaag ro qotox co' naniqan.
S.TRANSL: 到了播小米的季節，全家甚至全宗親必須先回到家裡，準備進行剝小米的程序。

S.FORM: manamanama' 'i' muhngiq i' imuwaag ru malahang cku' gaga ka hani. tiku magalaying ka gaga ka pisaniq ga, ini pasihriq i' imuwaag, ini usa' 'i' maqilaap i' imuwaag na' cuquliq ru ini usa' maskakaru' i' imuwaag na' cuquliq wiy.

manamanama' 'i' mohngiq i' imowaag ro malahang cko' gaga ka hani. tiko magalaying ka gaga ka pisaniq ga, ini pasihriq i' imowaag, ini osa' 'i' maqilaap i' imowaag na' coqoliq ro ini osa' maskakaro' i' imowaag na' coqoliq wiy.
S.TRANSL: 首要的禁忌是家裡不爭吵，既不能到別人家睡覺也不能到別人家聊天。

S.FORM: tiku tiputing ka gaga ka pisaniq ga, ini bi'ing cu' qaraqarax na' tatinun ku' kakanayril, ini bi'ing cu' buli' ru ragum ku' mamaliku.
tiko tipoting ka gaga ka pisaniq ga, ini bi'ing co' qaraqarax na' tatinon ko' kakanayril, ini bi'ing co' boli' ro ragom ko' mamaliko.
S.TRANSL: 次要的禁忌是女孩不觸碰織布用具，男孩則不能拿刀和針。

S.FORM: tiku tiputing lawiy ka gaga ka pisaniq ga, ini nahmuhmut kabawax cu' pinaylag na' hapuniq na' cuquliq, ini paglug 'i' maniq cku' buwinah na' naniqan, ini papabayq cu' naniqun wiy.
tiko tipoting lawiy ka gaga ka pisaniq ga, ini nahmohmot kabawax co' pinaylag na' haponiq na' coqoliq, ini paglog 'i' maniq cko' bowinah na' naniqan, ini papabayq co' naniqon wiy.
S.TRANSL: 第三個禁忌是絕不能與鄰居借火，更不能與別人共餐或提供別人食物。

S.FORM: tapaputing cubalay ka gaga ka pisaniq ga, ini bi'ing cu' cacapuh, ini capuh i' imuwaag wiy.
tapapoting cobalay ka gaga ka pisaniq ga, ini bi'ing co' cacapoh, ini capoh i' imowaag wiy.
S.TRANSL: 最後一個禁忌是絕不能拿掃把掃地。

S.FORM: galgan ta' kahabag ku' gaga ka hani la ga, babaw niya' la ga, pahbuw ku' turakis ru ma'usa' balaiq ku' naniqun ta' ka qutux cu' imuwaag la.
galgan ta' kahabag ko' gaga ka hani la ga, babaw niya' la ga, pahbow ko' torakis ro ma'osa' balaiq ko' naniqon ta' ka qotox co' imowaag la.
S.TRANSL: 只要奉行這樣的文化，未來，小米必會結實纍纍，家人更會有豐收的農作物。
